project_specification:
GeneralFOUNDATION & STRUCTURE

R.C.C framed structural design conforming to IS standard earth quake resistant structures.

SUPER STRCTURE

Solid/cement blocks/Red Bricks: External Walls 8/9 and internal walls 4

PLASTERING

R.C.C framed structural design conforming to IS standard earth quake resistant structures.

WALL FINISH

Internal: Treated with luppam and painted with emulsion paints of Asian or equivalent make.

External: Painted with weather- proof paints of Asian or equivalent make as per architectural design.

JOINERY WORKS

Main Door: M.T. wood frame & aesthetically designed Teak veneered shutter and finished with Melamine polish fitted with reputed make hardware. Internal doors: M.T. wood frame, designed skin doors of reputed make French door – UPVC sliding

WINDOWS

UPVC windows of reputed make with dear glass and safety grill in MS

FLOORING

Living, Drawing, Dining: 600*600mm vitrified tiles of reputed make. Bedrooms and Kitchens: 6000*600mm vitrified tiles of reputed make. Sit outs/Balcony: Anti-skid ceramic matt finished tiles. Staircase: Polished natural stone with SS railing Corridor: Matt finish vitrified tiles/granite tiles

KITCHEN

Granite Kitchen platform with stainless steel sink, ceramic tiles wall cladding up to height of 2 Above the kitchen platform. Electrical paints for fridge, washing machine

TOILETS

Tiles dodo: Glazed ceramic tile dodo up 7 height of reputed make Sanitary ware: Western style commands with health faucet. Wash basin in all toilets of Hind ware / cera or equivalent make CP Fitting: Wall mixture with overhead shower and other tops of Hind ware/ Cera or equivalent make. Provision for geyser and exhaust fan fitting in all bath rooms.

UTILITY & WASH AREA

Glazed ceramic tiles up to 3 height. Flooring with anti-skid acid resistant tiles. Provision for washing machine.

ELECTRICAL

3-PhasePower supply with MCB’s of reputed make. Concealed copper wiring (in conduits) of Standard make. Modular switches of Anchor/Northwest/Crabtree or equivalent make. Power outlets for air conditioners in living & master bed room with conduits. Power points for geysers and exhaust fans in all bath rooms

TELECOM & INTERNET

T.V. points in living & master bedroom, Telephone point in living room & provision for internet Wi-Fi connection in earth flat

SECURITY

24*7 Security and CC cameras

WATER SUPPLY

Underground storage sumps with pumping system and overhead tanks BACKUP GENERATOR Generator power backup for common usage and 2 fans. 2 lights for 3 BHk and 1 fan, 2 lights for 2 BHK

LIFTS

Each tower has 2 Nos lifts Johnson/Kone or equivalent make. I clubhouse 1 No lift. Total 11 Nas lifts of Johnson/Kane or equivalent make in the project.

project_specification: General	Foundations & Structure:-	R.C.C. Framed Structure in M 20 grade.		Superstructure:-	4 1/2" Walls with Light weight bricks in Cement Motor.		Finishing:-	Two coat plastering, for both internal and external walls, internal Lappam finishing in all rooms except toilets, kitchen and balconies.		Main Door:-	Take Wood door frames with teak wood shutters or designer door with melamine polishing and designer hardware of reputed make.		Other Doors:-	Teak Wood frames with flush shutters and hardware of reputed make, enamel painting with lappam finish.		Windows:-	UPVC with safety grills.		Water:-	Under ground sump for Bore well water and manjeera water.	Adequate bore wells.	Provision for manjeera water connection.		Painting/ Polishing:-	Interiors - Premium emulsion.	Exteriors - Road side elevation with BIRLA WALL CARE PUTTY painting with ACE Asian Paints.	Doors - Melamine polish for main doors and enamel paint   for internal doors.		Toilets:-	Standard make Shaver, Wash basin hot & cold valve mixer, EWC of standard make.	Provisions for geysers in all bathrooms.		Kitchen:-	Granite Platform with steel sink and provision for exhust fan, upgradable to designer, modular kitchen at extra cost.  		Electrical:-	Standard Canceled wiring for lights, fans plug provision of A/c points in all bed rooms with modular switches of standard make.		Sanitary System:-	PVC pipelines and fittings for sanitary systems, UPVC pipeline and fitting for water supply system.

project_specification: GeneralSUPER STRUCTURER.C.C. frame with 9" thick outer walls and 4Â½" thick brick partition walls with two coats of plastering sponge finish final and complete flat smooth altek/luppum finish.FLOORINGVitrified tiles with skirting size 24"x24".DOORSAll doors frames in teak wood and internal doors with flush type door shutters of standard make with required number of powder coated aluminium hardware.MAIN DOOR FITTINGSMain door with teak wood door frame with both side teak veneer shutter with magic eye, brass safety chain, night latch, tower bolt, and vertibolt lock.WINDOWS/VENTILATORSPowder coated aluminium windows, steel grills for security and provision for mosquito mesh shutter.KITCHENGranite top cooking platform with 2'-0" high coloured glazed tile dado, stainless steel sink.TOILETSIndian W.C. or European W.C. standard make white sanitary ware per each flat with glazed tiles dadoing upto door height, and non skid ceramic tile flooring in all toilets.PAINTINGSOil bound distemper for inner walls, sandtex/apex exterior paint for external walls, enamel paint for wood work, grills.ELECTRICALSConcealed copper wiring with adequate light power points, fan, tv, telephone point, 3 phase meter connection to each flat and db's with MCB isolators, phone and broadband facility, modular switches. ( provision for split A/c, T.V, and telephone in master bed room ).PLUMBING & WATERConcealed piping with high quality chrome plated fittings one drinking water C.P. tap in kitchen wall mixer in bath, connection for geyser and shower, borewell water through overhead tank.BOREWELLS/SUMPSBorewell sump for storing water, borewell / municipal water shall be provided through over head tanks.LIFTShall be provided as per plan of reputed make.GENERATORShall be provided at an extra cost as the said is compulsory. and shall be shared by each of the flat owners.(generator is for back up for lifts, pumps, common / corridor lighting and each flat 6 light points ).COMMON AREASMarble flooring for steps and vitrified tiles with skirting for corridors.EXHAUST FANProvision shall be given in kitchen and toilets.WARDROBEAll bedrooms provided with adequate wardrobe space.FIRE/EXTINGUISHERShall be provided as required as per plan.CAR PARKING AREATiled flooring .SECURITY24hrs, security service, epabx facility with the security room, panic buzzer in each flat.

project_specification: General	Structure:	Earthquake resistant RCC framed structure in accordance with IS 456:2000, 1893:2002		Super Structure:	External and internal partition walls with red bricks and AAC blocks		Wall Finish:	External plastering: Waterproof plastering in cement mortar mix, painted with Asian Exterior Paint	Internal plastering: Cement mortar plastering with luppam finish, painted with Asian Emulsion Paint or equivalent brand		Flooring:	2' x 2' vitrified tiles of good quality in all rooms	Ceramic tiles of good quality in balconies, utility and common areas	Anti-skid ceramic tile flooring in toilets	Ceramic tile dado up to door height in toilets		Doors & Windows:	Main door: Best quality teak wood frame and designer teak veneered flush shutters, painted with melamine polish and fixed with stainless steel hardware	Internal doors: MT teak wood frame and designer flush shutters, painted with Asian Enamel Paint or equivalent brand and fixed with stainless steel hardware	Windows: Best quality UPVC sliding frames fitted with plain glass		Kitchen:	20 mm thick granite for kitchen platform	Glazed ceramic tile dado up to 2' height above the kitchen platform	Provision for exhaust/chimney	Provision for water purification system	Stainless steel sink with tap for kitchen counter		Sanitary & Plumbing:	Premium quality sanitary fittings of Hindware or equivalent brand	All CP fittings and accessories of Jaquar-Clarion series or equivalent brand		Electrical:	PVC conduction, point wiring & circuit wiring of Polycab or equivalent brand	Modular switches of Anchor Roma or equivalent brand	Power points for refrigerator, grinder, oven in kitchen and washing machine point in utility	Geyser point in bathrooms	Sufficient number of points for lighting and power	Television & telephone points in master bedroom and living room		Air Conditioning:	Provision for AC points in master and children's bedroom for 3 BHK and master bedroom in 2 & 2  Study BHK		Parking:	Adequate car parking in the cellar and stilt floors		Lift:	Automatic passenger lifts of standard make		Generator:	Power backup for two lights, one fan for 2 & 2 Study BHK; two lights, two fans for 3 BHK and one light, one fan for 1 BHK; 30% power backup in common areas		Water Supply:	Manjeera water connection		Sewage Treatment Plant:	Waste water treated by STP and reused for gardening and flushing

project_specification: GeneralFoundationIsolated RCC footings with Tie beams for earthquake resistanceRCC Framed StructureRCC framed structure (as per IS:456-200, iS:875 & IS: 875 & IS: 4326-1993)Super StructureFirst class table moulded lightweight brickwork in cement mortar.PlasteringInternal Single coat sponge finished cement plastering & gypsum plaster to fine finish.Ceiling Single coat smooth finished cement plastering. External: Double coat and faced cement plastering.JoineryMain Door : Teak wood frame and Teak paneled door shutter, with aesthetically designed and polished.internal Doors : Medium Teak wood frame and hard-core flush shutter with painted and standard hardware.WindowsTeak wood glazed shutters with safely grills.PaintingInternal : Two coats of emulsion over a :base coat of primer. Celling : Two coats of emulsion over a base coat of primer. External: Texture paint and acrylic paints. Parking Areas & Services : Two coats of acrylic emulsion paint over a base coat of primer.FlooringStaircase : Marble.Corridor : MarbleDrawing,Dining & Living :  Marble/ VitrifiedKitchen : MarbleToilets : Anti skid ceramic tiles.Utility : Anti skid ceramic tiles.KitchenPolished black granite platform with stainless steel sink.ToiletsCeramic glazed tiles dado upto 7' height, white colour EWC., wash basin with chromium plated fittings and health faucet.ElectricalConcealed copper wiring conduits for lights, fan, plug and power plug points wherever necessary. Power outlets for A/c in master bedrooms. Power outlets for cooking range, refrigerator, micro oven and mixer grinder in kitchen. Plug points for TV & Audio systems etc., Wherever necessary. Miniature circuit breakers (MCB) & ELCB for each distribution board. Generator back-up for lift, common areas, one light and one fan for each flat.TelecomTelephone points in and master bed room. Intercom facilities to all the units connecting security.Cable TVConcealed cables to hall & Master bed room.Lifts6 Passenger lift with V3F technology with generator backup.Parking1 Car parking for each flat.

project_by: By SAS Constructions in LB Nagar
project_specification: General	Structure	R.C.C framed structure.		Super Structure	All internal walls & external walls 4 thickness light weight red brick.		Plastering	Smooth sponge finishing in cement mortar. Hall dining & bedrooms with luppam finishing.		Flooring	Vitrified tiles (2x2) flooring in all living, dining & bedroom.		Doors/Windows	Main Door: Frames & Shutter Teak wood with necessary hardware & polish.	Internal Doors: Frames, Teak wood, Shutters company made flush doors along with necessary hardware and painted.		Windows	Frames Teak wood, shutters Teak wood with glass, necessary hardware and paint along with safety grills.	Seasoned wood frames with wood shutters and suitable M.S. safety grills with pin head glass.		Painting	Main door with polish, luppum finishing in internal walls enamel paints for grills, OBD for internal walls, suitable exterior paints for external walls.		Kitchen	Granite platform with built in sink, ceramic tile dado upto 2 height.		Toilets	Standard quality sanitary ware, ceramic tiles dado upto 6, provision for mixture shower, soap tray in attached toilets and wash basin in dining hall.		Electrical	Concealed copper wiring with adequate light fan points and provision for power points.		Plumbing	Concealed PVC or G.I. fitting of standard make		Lift	Six passengers lift of standard make.

project_specification: General	Structure	R.C.C. framed structure.	a) Footing : 1:11/2:3 pro.(M 20 grade) & 1:2:4 (M 15 grade).	b) Columns : 1:11/2:3 pro.(M 20 grade) & 1:2:4 (M 15 grade).	c) Beams & Slabs : 1:2:4 pro.(M15 grade).		Superstructure	Table moulded bricks in C.M.(1:6)pro.		Plastering	C.M.(1.6) & (1:4) in two coats with Altek finish in hall & C.M.(1:6) & (1:4) in two coats in all other areas. "POP" cornices shall be provided in hall.		Doors	Main door (3'6"x6'9") frames and shutters with teak & other frames in medium teak & flush shutter.	a) Main door: Polishing, cuddapah painting brass aldrops, tower bolts, door stoppers, brass hinges, eye piece.	b) Other doors: Powder coated iron oxide, tower bolts, handles etc.	c) Toilet doors: Flush door with film coated back side for waterproof full height.		Windows	Frame with medium teak & glazed shutters with safety grill of standard design.		Flooring	Marble flooring of size 2'x4'/2'x2' vitrified in hall and ceramic flooring in other areas. Caramic tiles in toilets with 6'-0" dado.		Kitchen	Platform with granite top with built in sink / Stainless steel with 2'0' ceramic dado.		Sanitary & Water Supply	a) Two water connections, one for municipal wate and one for bore water shall be provided in kitchen.	b) Toilets shall be provided with one Indian W.C., and one Western W.C., with low level flush tanks.	c) Chromium plated taps, showers shall be provided in standard brand.	d) Two wash basins shal be provided in one toilet & dining / balcony.	e) Provision for geyser in attached toilet. In 2nd toilet geyser pipe line shall be provided without shower.	f) Sump for municipal water and bore water separately shall be provided with motor to over head tank.		Electrical	a) Concealed fine cab (ISI) multistand copper wiring with adequate pooints including 2-T.V., 2-Telephone, 1-Fridge,	1-Geyser point and 1-AC point in Master bedroom in each flat.	b) Three-phase electric wiring shall be provided.	c) Night lamp provision at foot level in each bedroom.	d) Piano type switches of standard make.	e) Lift: New lift for 6 passengers of standard make, granite cladding at parking level and other floors in ceramic.	f) Bore Motor: 3 Phase submersible pmp of 6 1/2" dia.	g) Transformer - "Hint/Venugopal/Radhika" of required capacity.		Paintings	Colour washing oil bound distemper for interior walls & cement based paint for exterior surfaces and two coats enamel paints for doors & windows with luppam finish.		Gates	2 No's 12'0" design gates with wicket gate.

GeneralRCC framed structure designed to withstand wind force and seismic loads for Zone IISuper Structure:First class masonry with Redbrick / Cement mortar. External 9" thick & Internal 4Â½" thick wall

Granite platform with stainless steel sink

Main Door :Best Teak wood door frame & shutter aesthetically designed with melamine polishing with hardware of reputed make.Internal Doors :Teak wood frame and skin doors painting with Luppum finishing with standard hardware

All toilets will consist of :Water connection with CPVC pipes.Toilets shall be provided with one Indian WC and Western WCWash basins shall be provided in dining and attached toilets.Hot and Cold water mixer with shower. All C.P fittings are of standard make

Powder coated Aluminium windows with glass panels and safety grills

(a) Concealed copper wiring of reputed make in conduits for lights, fan, plug and power plug points wherever necessary.(b) Modular switches of reputed make.(c) TV & Internet connection in living room and Master bedroom.(d) Power outlet for air-conditioner in Master bedroom.(e) Power outlets for geysers and Exhaust in toilets.(f) Power plug for chimney, refrigerator, mixer in kitchen.(g) 20 Amps 3- Phase supply for each unit and individual meter boards.(h) Miniature Circuit Breakers for each distribution board of MDS / Merlingerin or equivalent make 

Internal walls:Smooth finish with Luppum in halls & bedrooms with plastic emulsionExternal walls:Exterior emulsion paints or equivalent.

project_specification:
GeneralFOUNDATION & STRUCTURE

RCC framed structure shall be designed and built taking due care of earthquake and
wind forces and safe bearing capacity of the strata. The structure shall be built with
ready-mix concrete of reputed manufacturers

BRICKWORK & PLASTERING

Flyash cement brick work in 9" thick for external walls and 4" thick for internal walls.
Internal and external plastering in double coat with cement mortar as per standard
mix

MAIN DOOR

Good quality Teak wood frame, panelled shutter finished with melamine polish and
SS Matt finish hardware

INTERNAL DOORS

Teak wood frame with both side laminated designed flush door shutter with SS Matt
finish hardware

WINDOWS

Best quality uPVC windows with glass and granite patti around the windows

PAINTING

Internal: Smooth finish with two coats of Wallcare putty, one coat of primer and two
coats of Royal emulsion paint
External: Combination of texture paint as per Architectural design

FLOORING

Drawing, dining, living, kitchen and staircase with composite marble. Master
bedroom with wooden flooring. Other bedrooms with 800 x 800 mm vitrified tiles,
sit-out and balcony with rustic vitrified tiles of 300 x 300 mm.

TILES DADOING AND FLOORING

Kitchen Platform: Platform and cladding up to 2'0" height with granite tiles
Toilets: Designer glazed ceramic tiles dadoing up to 7'0" height and flooring with anti-
skid ceramic tiles with good quality
Utility/Wash: Glazed ceramic tiles dado up to 3'0" height

TOILETS

All toilets consist of Dry and Wet area, granite counter for washbasin, hot & cold
diverter with shower, wall hung WC's (concealed flush tanks), solar water heating
system with geyser backup

KITCHEN

Modular kitchen with granite top, chimney (provision only), stainless steel sink
(Frankle) with hot & cold wall mixer for Corporation water and bore well

ELECTRICAL

Concealed copper wiring in conduits for lighting, fan, plug and power points as per
Architectural drawings
Power outlets for air-conditioners and TV points in all bedrooms, living and dining.
Power outlets for geysers in all bathrooms. Power outlet for cooking range chimney,
refrigerator, microwave oven, mixer/grinder in kitchen as per Architectural drawing
Individual meter board, Miniature Circuit Breaker(MCB) of standard make for each
distribution board as per Architectural drawing

AIR-CONDITIONING

Split A/C provision with prefixed piping in all bedrooms, living and dining area

TELECOM

Telephone points in all bedrooms, drawing and living area. Provision for Internet
connection in living room and bedrooms or Wi-fi router will be provided

CABLE TV

Provision for cable TV in all bedrooms and living

POWER BACKUP

100% Power back-up including common areas except for air-conditioning and geyser

WATER SUPPLY

First quality ISI mark GI/CPVC piping for internal plumbing


DRAINAGE SYSTEM

ISI mark PVC sanitary piping

project_specification: GeneralFrame: RCC framed structureBrick Work: 9" brick work in cement mortar for outside walls and 4 1/2" brick work in cement mortar for inside wallsWalls finish: Outside sponge finish, inside walls smooth lappam finishDoor & Windows: All MT wood framesShutters: Main door in full teak wood with carving, other doors with water proofing quality solid commercial flush shutters, windows with glazed shutters with MT window framesFlooring: Marble flooring or vitrified tiles 2'x2' sizeKitchen: Granite platform with stainless steel sink and glazed tiles up to 2'6" height from platformBathroom: Wall tiles concept tiles up to door top level, floor tiles non-skid to match with wall tiles, sanitary ware Johnson Peddar or equivalent, fixtures one mixture with shower, one tap-foam type of good quality and small wash basinElectrical: Wiring with standard ISI quality 1/18, 3/20, 7/20 multi-strand copper wire, modular switches in Anchor Roma/ Elleys or equivalent makeParking Area: Well laid non-skid parking tilesGenerator: Stand-by generator of 25 KWA capacity connecting 3 points in each house, clubhouse and main gate lightsTV: Central dish and connection to each house (TATA Sky/ Reliance/ Videocon or others)(Monthly subscription to be paid directly to provider by owners)Intercom: BSNL land line to each house with intercom facility (monthly rentals to BSNL to be paid by owner)

project_specification:
GeneralSTRUCTURE
 Frame of L&T, Birla or equivalent in 53 grade & TMT steel of reputed make.
 
SUPER STRUCTURE
 Table mouded bricks / Light weight bricks walls.
 
FINISHES
 Walls (internal): Cement plastered, smooth putty finish with plastic emulsion paint.
 Walls / columns in parking area: Cement plastered with 0 B D paint.
 External walls: Cement plastered, plastic emulsion paint  (Apex) / textured paint.
 Toilet walls: Dado in ceramic tiles upto lintel level.
 Kitchen walls: Dado in ceramic tiles of 2’O”height above the kitchen Counter.
 Ceiling: Painted with plastic emulsion paint and OBD In parking areas.
 
FLOORINGS
 Master Bedroom: Marble/vitrified flooring
 Kitchen / Toilets: Anti-skid ceramic floor
 All other areas in the flat: 2 x 2’ vitrified ceramic floor
 Corridors / Steps: Matt finished vitrified floor/Marble
 Parking Area Chequered cement tiles flooring with granite inlays
 Driveways Chequered cement tiles / cobble stones,
 
WINDOWS/DOORS
 Sliding UPVC windows / aluminum powder coated windows.
 
MAIN DOORS
 Wood frame, paneled door, polished.
 
INTERNAL DOORS
 Teak wood frame, laminated flush doors.
 
KITCHEN
 Black granite kitchen platform with stainless steel sink. Basin mixer for hot & cold water.
 
ELECTRICAL
 Concealed copper wiring of Standard make Modular switches
 Branded T.V/ Internet connections drawing and master bed room Adequate power points for Air conditioners / geysers /cooking range / refrigerator / exhaust fans. Miniature circuit  breakers 3-phase power with individual meters Generator / common area lighting / one fan and one light point in every  flat.
 
PLUMBING
 Concealed CPVC/GI pipes of good quality of 1S1 Mark
 CP Fitting Jaguar /or equalant
 Sanitary - Cera / parryware or equalant
 
MASTER TOIlET
 Wall hung European W.C wash basin Single lever shower mixer
 Single lever basin mixer
 
OTHER TOILETS
 Floor / Wall mounted European W.C Half Pedestal wash basin Single lever shower/ mixer Single lever basin

project_specification: General	Flooring        	The flooring in the living, dining and bedrooms will be of vitrified tile.	The flooring in the Kitchen,toilets, balconies & wash area will be of first quality antiskid Ceramic tiles.	Note: Size, color and brand will be of our choice depending on bulk availability.		Wall Tiling	 Kitchens will have first quality ceramic wall tiles for 2 feet above the platform.	 Toilets will have first quality ceramic wall tiles for 6 feet height from floor level.	 Service areas will have ceramic tile for 4 feet height.	 Note : Size, color and brand will  be of our choice depending  on bulk availability.		Kitchen Platform & Sink	Kitchen platform will be provided with Black granite	Kitchens will have Stainless steel/Granite sink without a drain board.	One loft of RCC will be provided in the kitchen.		Doors / Windows / Ventilators	Main door frame will be made of teak wood with skin Shutters.	Bedroom doors will be made of country wood frame with skin shutters.	Toilet doors will be made of country wood frame with flush shutter. One side of the door will have PVC lamination for suitable height.	French doors will be made of anodized aluminium frame and shutters with glass of suitable size.	Windows will be of swing/sliding type with anodized aluminium.	 Ventilators will be of Aluminium.		Painting Finishes	Living, Dining & Bedroom walls will be coated with putty an finished with emulsion paint.	All doors will be finished with enamel paint.	Windows and ventilator grills will be finished with enamel paint.	Note: The color of the paint wherever not mentioned will be as per our choice. Alterations in the elevation of flat & fixing of grills will not be entertained under any circumstances.		Electrical	Modular switches of ANCHOR ROMA (or) CRABTREE (or) LITASKI (or) equivalent will be provided.	Three phase supply with concealed wiring will be provided. The actual supply will be single or three phase based on the APSEB rules and regulations at the time of energizing the complex.	Separate meter will be provided for each flat in the main board located outside the flat at the place of our choice.	Common meters will be provided for common services in the main board.	Splitor window A/C provision will be provided in master bedroom only.	15A plug points will be provided for Cooking range, refrigerator, Washing machine and geyser in toilets.	The wiring for 5A points will be of 1.5 sq.mm rating adequate for equipments of capacity of 750W and 15A points will be of 2.5sq.mm rating adequate for equipments of capacity of 1500W. A/C wiring will be of 4 sq.mm which can take up a capacity of 2 tonnes.	Power backup for minimum essential points in common areas & lift will be provided.	TV and Telephone Cable	 TV and Telephone points will be provided in the Living and master bedroom.	The cables for TV and Telephone connections will be provided.	 	Plumbing & Sanitary	 All toilets will be provided with European Water Closet.	Dining will be provided with wash basin.	Good quality CP fittings will be provided in the toilets.	 	SALIENT FEATURES	 Abundant greenery for a pollution free ambience, assuring your family completely 'stress free' living for generations.	The entry to the Apartments is through an elegantly designed Ground Floor lobby with Marble (or) Granite flooring and ambient lighting.	The upper floor lobbies are accessed through a life and a staircase and are welcomed by intricately crafted main doors of apartments.	An Army of trained security personnel is on alert round the clock for safety.	Intercom facility from each apartment to security rooms and club house.	Power backup for essential points in common areas & lift will be provided.	Fire fighting system will be provided as per standards.	 	<!--{cke_protected}{C}<!--		@page { margin: 2cm }		TD P { margin-bottom: 0cm }		P { margin-bottom: 0.21cm }	-->-->		I. PRE EMI PLAN:																					On Booking															Rs. 50,000/-																			Within 15days															20%							Note: On payment of 20%, Sale Agreement shall be executed and accordingly, Home Loan should be processed.	II. REGULAR PLAN:																					On Booking															Rs.50000																			Within 10 days															10%																			Within 30 days															20%																			On completion of 3rd floor roof slab															15%																			On completion of 6th floor roof slab															15%																			On completion of 9th floor roof slab															10%																			On completion of 12th floor roof slab															10%																			On completion of 14th floor roof slab															10%																			On completion of flooring															5%																			During Handing over															5%																									Note: 																						Cheque in favor of JAIN HOUSING & CONSTRUCTIONS LTD 																															Registration charges, VAT, Service tax as per Govt prevailing rates 																															Rates will be confirmed at the time of booking 																															Service tax will be collected on pro rata basis with every payment. VAT at the time of registration or as applicable government rules																		The project is approved by all major banks and easy loan facility is available from the banks.

project_specification:
GeneralFOUNDATION & STRUCTURE:

RCC framed structure with ready mix concrete M 20. Earthquake Resistant with plinth beam as per HMDA standards with Termite proofing.

SUPER STRUCTURE

Red clay brick work in cement mortar walls of 9” thickness outer wall and 4 ½” thick inner walls.

PLASTERING

INTERNAL: Double coat cement plastering with sponge finish and luppam finish.

EXTERNAL: Double coat cement plastering with sponge finish.

JOINERY WORKS

MAIN DOOR: High quality Teak wood frame & shutter, polished, fixed with good quality hardware accessories.

INTERNAL DOORS: Good Quality Teak wood frame with flush doors.

WINDOWS: UPVC Windows  mosquito mesh panel shutter using suitable sections of reputed make with safety grills and glass shutters.

PAINTING

INTERNAL: Plastic emulsion painted up to two coats for a superb finishing and look, over a luppam finish.

EXTERNAL: Premium quality ACE painting (Weather & Water proof)

COMMON AREA: Oil Bound Distemper painting done tidily.

FLOORING

Vitrified tiles 2' X 2'. With 4” dadooing.

Common Area: Granite Flooring in Corridor & Staircase with 4” dadooing.

Parking: Cement Tiles or Interlocking Pavers of best quality will be provided.

TILE CLADDING & DADOOING

TOILETS: Designer glazed ceramic tile dado up to door height.

KITCHEN: Ceramic tile dado up to 2 feets height above kitchen platform.

UTILITY/WASH: Glazed ceramic tiles dado up to 2'-6' height.

Lift Entrance at all floors to be dadoed with granite to full height at all levels.

KITCHEN PLATFORM

Granite platform with steel sink with ground & municipal water connection provision, Exhaust Fan Provision.

TOILETS

E.M.C in Master bedroom with flush tank.

I.W.C for Other toilet with flush tank.

Hot and cold water mixer with shower provision for geyser in all bathrooms.

All fixers are C.P. coated best quality standard branded makes.

ELECTRICAL

Concealed copper wiring of standard make (ISO certified).

Switches & Plugs of standard make.

Power outlets for A/C in all bedroom.

Power outlets for Geyser in all Bathrooms

Plug points for TV. & Audio systems.

3 phase supply for each unit and individual master boards.

Miniature circuit breakers (MCB) & ELCB for each distribution board.

Power plug outlets for cooking range chimney, refrigerator, microwave oven and mixer grinder in kitchen.

TELEPHONE & CABLE TV

Provision for master bedroom and drawing / living room.

LIFT

2 Lifts of Standard make.

GENERATOR

Acoustic generator of Standard make.

Backup for 2 lights and 2 fans in Hall and Master Bedroom in all flats and Total common light points, and Lifts..

SECURITY

Solar Fenced Compound Wall.

CC Cameras Covering Parking & Common Areas.

Intercom Connecting all the flats.

project_specification: General	Foundation & Structure :	Earthquake resistant foundation with RCC framed   structure.	To withstand wind and seismic loads for zone – II.	 	Superstructure :	Flyash / table molded brick.	 	Wall FinishesInternal Plastering :	Surface luppam/ putty and painted with acrylic emulsion of approved colour and premium brand.	 	Wall FinishesExternal Plastering :	Stone cladding/Texture coat.	 	Doors	Main Door :	Best Teak wood frame & shutter aesthetically designed with melamine matt polish fixed with door eye view /Imported Sandoor doors.	Brass/ SS hardware with night latch, safety chain of superior brands like Dorset or Equivalent.	 	Internal Doors :	Best Teak wood frame with hard core soiled flush shutter on both sides 4 mm veneer and necessary lippings & beading, finished with melamine	matt polish and reputed make hardware/Imported Sandoor doors.	UPVC French doors.	Windows & French Doors	UPVC/fenesta or equivalent make.	 	Flooring :	Laminated wooden flooring in Master Bedroom.	Vitrified tiles flooring in Kitchen/utility and servant rooms and other Bedrooms and other Areas.	Italian composite Marble in dinning, and drawing rooms.	Vitrified tiles for utility.	 	Kitchen Flooring :	Vitrified titles flooring of standard make.	Toilets Flooring	Best quality acid resistant Anti skid designer ceramic Tiles dadoing up to 7’0” height.	Kitchen Platform	Provision for modular kitchen.	Provision exhausts fan and chimney.	Provision for aqua guard, Telephone point in Kitchen area.	Glazed tiles above the Kitchen Platform	 	Electrical :	Concealed copper wiring of standard make, in conduits for lights, fan, plug and points wherever necessary.	Power outlets for Air Conditioners Hall, Dining, Living Room & all bedrooms.	Power outlets for geysers in all bathrooms.	Power plug for cooking range chimney, refrigerator, micro oven, mixer grinders in kitchen.	Plug points for TV.	3-phase supply for each unit and individual meter boards.	Miniature circuit breakers (MCB) & ELCB for each distribution board.	100% back up with individual consumption Meters.	Switches form Legrand company / or another Premium Quality.	 	Sanitary and Plumbing :	Sanitary Fittings :	Bathroom sanitary fittings – Roca, Toto,  American	 	Standard or equivalent :	Shower enclosures in glass in Master Bed Room Bath.	Provision Geyser in all bathrooms including maid’s Bathroom and kitchen including maid’s Bathroom.	CP Fittings of superior band like Toto, Jaguar or equivalent in bathrooms and kitchen.	 	Water Supply Piping :	Superior quality CPVC piping with special fitting as per relevant IS specification		Sanitary and Rain Water Piping :	Superior quality HDPE/PVC piping with special fitting as per relevant IS specification.	All plumbing points will be pressure tested in accordance and required of the bureau of Indian Standards.	Pneumatic water pumping system with  Water treatment plant and Sewerage treatment plant.	Staircase Railing/External Hand Railing	S S Railing / Duco paint finish or equivalent Glass for staircase and balconies.	 	External Paving’s :	Cement Based tiles in Car Porch/ Patios / Drive ways.		Telecom :	Telephone points in all bedrooms, living, family and dining areas, intercom connection to all the Villas from security. Wifi	 	Cable TV & Internet :	T V Point in all bedrooms, living room & family and dining areas. Provision for broad band connectivity to each Villa.	NOTE: Changes in specification would be taken up at additional cost and feasibility.

project_specification:
GeneralFRAME WORK :

R.C.C. framed Structure

SUPER STRUCTURE: 

Solid Cement Blocks

WINDOWS :

Aluminium 3track windows.

DOORS: Main Door in Solid Teak Wood & Flush door shutter with teak Veneer, Internal Doors-Teak Wood Frame and Flush Door with Teak Veneer and one side Teak veneer flush door for bathrooms.

WINDOWS:UPVC Windows.

FLOORING : 

Italian Marble Flooring, Skirting in living & dining areas. Wooden flooring in multipurpose and master bed room and premium vitrified tiles in other bed rooms. Anti-Skid Ceramic Tile Flooring in Toilets, Balconies and utility areas. Paver Blocks for car portico area of Ultra tiles or equivalent.

KITCHEN: 

Granite Counter with Ceramic Tile dado up to 2’above Counter & stainless steel sink (Single Bowl single Drain), Ceramic tile cladding in the wash area.

WALL FINISHES : 

All interior walls with smooth with smooth finish & Acrylic emulsion Paint over Birla / JK Cement Putty. All Exterior walls with cement based exterior paint of Apex or Equivalent on two coats of putti.

TOILET / BATHS : 

European WC’s wash basin of Kohler or Equivalent make. Toilet accessories of Kohler continental or equivalent make. Provision for shower panels in toilets as per Design/ glass partition.

POWER : 

Concealed copper wiring of standard make Power flex in all necessary areas. Electrical fittings & fixer of Legrand/Anchor / Roma / equivalent make. Provision for electric chimney in Kitchen, exhaust fans in kitchen & Bathrooms. Provision for Split A.C.units in Ground Floor, living room & all Bedrooms.

COMMUNICATIONS :

Telephone & internet points in all bedrooms, living & dining rooms.

CABLE :

Provision for cable T.V. in living room and all bedrooms

GENERATOR / D.G.BACKUP :

Stand –by power for common amenities. Total DG Power Back up for each individual

WATER :24 –hours water supply through centralized hydro Pneumatic system and WTP, STP for sewer treatment

COMMON SERVICES :

Power Back up for Street Lighting. Concealed underground cabling for power & communication. Concealed underground water supply for total town ship. Community maintenance by dedicated agency to handle landscaping, garbage and services.

project_specification:
GeneralStructure    :    R.C.C Framed structure.Walls    :    Red Brick with Central Mortar.Plastering    :    Plastering in Cement mortar in Double Coat with sponge finish.Flooring    :    Marble slabs in hall and dining, Marble Tiles in Bed Rooms, Kitchen and balconies or vitrified tiles size 2' * 2' Ceramic non slippery tiles flooring in Bathrooms.Doors    :    All door frames are made with teak wood, main door with teak wood shutter remaining are with flush shutters. Main door with BT, remaining all with MT.Windows    :    Well Seasoned teak wood frames with frames with fixed iron Grills , and teak wood glazed shutters.Kitchen    :    Granite Kitchen platform with sink and 2' height glazed tiles dadoo.Toilets    :    Glazed wall tiles up to 6' height and standard sanitary fitting (preferred parry ware / Hindware / cera). Master Bedroom bathroom with wall mixture. Remain bathrooms with long body tap.Plumbing    :    All water pipelines are with CPVC/PPR and PVC pipes, for drainage lines, C.P. fittings of standard make.Electrification    :    Concealed copper wiring ( preferred Finecab/ or equal Cable) with all adequate Light, Fan points , A.C. T.V. & Telephone points etc . with modular switches ( preferred Anchor switches).Painting    :    Paint for windows , internal doors for wood work OBD/ Plastic emulsion paint with smooth luppum finishing for internal walls and weather coat paint for external walls.Water    :    Bore well water sump and Muncipal water sump and borewell water tank , Municipal water tank with adequate capacity. Bore well water supply-through over head tank in toilets, wash area and municipal drinking water in kitchen.Lift    :    One for 6 passenger's lift of standard company leading to all floors preferred KONE or equal.Generator    :    For lift , common lighting & one light point, one fan in each flat.

      More  About Sai Samarth Residency  
  
    
      
        
	Located close to all major IT Parks, Financial district, on Hyderabad Growth Corridor, near APPA Junction Outer Ring Road, which is Equi-distant from Gacchibowli, Shamshabad International Airport and Assembly. The Project is surrounded with many Engineering colleges, International schools and Proposed Manchirevula Reliance 100 Floors Tower etc.

project_by: By Balaji Constructions in Appa Junction
amenities_list: {u'Outdoor Games': u'Play Area', u'Convenience': u'Lift                            \n                                \n                                24Hr Backup Electricity', u'Safety & Security': u'Security', u'Fitness': u'Gymnasium'}
project_specification:
Generalstructure
R.C.0 framed structure as per structural design. The builder will use ISI marked cement and 151 marked TMT steel.

wall_finishing
i) External walls 9" thick table molded bricks with cement motor 1:6. ii) All internal walls 4.5" thick table molded bricks with cement mortar 1:4 with suitable hoop iron and R C C bands.

doors
Main door: Best quality teak wood frame of 125mm X 75mm thick and teak wood shutter door of 40mm thick with melamine finish and brass fittings. Other doors: Teak wood frame of 100mm X 75mm thick and water proof flush shutters of 40mm thick.

windows
UPVC

toilet_fittings
Toilets & wash area: Anti skid ceramic tiles for flooring and walls up to 7'0" will be provided. Each toilet will be provided with one E.W.0 and one 18" wash basin and concealed wall mixture. Each Flat will be provided one 18" wash basin in dinning area.

kitchen
Black granite counter top with SS sink. 2 feet height wall tile dado above counter top.

electrical
Concealed PVC pipes and copper wiring with modular switches. Provision of adequate points for AC, lights, fans, calling bell, TV, telephone and internet.

flooring
Flooring: Good quality of 2X2 vitrified tiles ( NITCO/ JOHNSON ) in hall, bedrooms, kitchen and corridors.

others
Plastering: Two coats of smooth internal plastering and two coats of external plastering with waterproof cement compound. Altech Putty finished smooth will be used. Painting: Tractor emulsion for the inner walls with luppam finishing Elevation sides with texture paintings. Weather shield for the other exterior walls, enamel for the internal doors and windows and melamine polish for the main door as per architectural features. Plumbing: All water pipelines are with best quality I S I marked G.I pipes. All sanitary fittings will be from Hindware. All Plumbing fittings will be Plumber. Prince PVC pipes for waste and sanitary water, plumber fittings in bathroom. Water supply: Bore water will be supplied through sump and overhead tanks. 15. Compound wall with suitable gates as per design to be provided.

project_specification:
GeneralStructure    

RCC framed structure.

 

Walls    

6” Thick solid cement concrete block for external walls and 4” thick solid cement block masonry for internal walls.
 

 

Plastering    

All internal & external walls with smooth plaster finish

 

Doors    

Main door in teak frame with masonite skin moulded door shutter with melamine polishing and reputed make hardware, Internal doors in non teak wood frame and flush door shutters.

 

Windows    

UPVC Sliding doors with mosquito mesh.

 

French Doors    

UPVC Sliding Shutters on two tracks with glass of 5mm thickness.

 

Lifts    

4 Nos of 6 passenger high speed passenger lift with V3F for energy efficiency.

 

Flooring    

Living, Dining and Bedrooms (24”x24”) vitrified tiles of standard make. Kitchen & balcony: (16”x16”) ceramic tiles of standard make; Bathrooms: acid resistant and anti skid ceramic tiles of standard make; Utilities/wash area: anti skid ceramic tiles (12”x12”) of standard make.

 

Painting    

External: Regular texture paints and weather proof emulsion regular range Internal: Two coat putty, one coat primer two coat acrylic emulsion paints with roller finishing.

 

Air Condition    

Provision for split A/C for all Bedrooms.

 

Cable T.V.    

Provision for cable connection in all bedrooms and leaving room.

 

Internet    

One internet point provision in each flat.

 

Utilities/Wash area  

 Provision for washing machine & wet area for washing utensils.

 

Water Supply    

Provision for municipal water.

 

Corridors    

Granite tiles (24”*24”)

 

French Doors    

Aluminum powder coated two tracks with float glass of 5 mm thickness.

 

Dadoing    

Glazed ceramic tiles dado upto 2’ height above kitchen platform. Toilets (12?*18) glazed ceramic tile dado of standard make upto 7’-0’ height.

 

Kitchen    

Granite platform with stainless steel sink and provision for fixing RO system

 

Plumbing & Sanitary ware    

CP fitting of ESSESS / Jaguar or equivalent make in toilets and kitchen. Cera, Johnson or equivalent make sanitary ware in all toilets. Floor mounted EWC with flush tank of standard make. Rectangular shape washbasin. Provision for Geyser in all bedrooms.

 

Electrical    

Concealed copper wire of Anchor, Fine cab or equivalent make PVC conduits of brand Sudhakar or equivalent make, Modular switches: Anchor Roma or equivalent make.

 

Lifts  

4 Nos of 6 passenger high speed passenger lift with V3F for energy efficiency.

 

Power Backup    

DG backup for lifts & common area, 5 points in each 2 BHK flat & 7 points in each 3 BHK flat.

 

Security    

The entire property is secured with a compound wall along with solar fencing and entrance will be manned by a security team.

 

STP & WTP  

Water Treatment Plant for bore well water and Sewage Treatment Plant of adequate capacity as per norms will be provided inside the project. Treated sewage water will be used for landscaping.

project_specification:
GeneralSpecifications

FOUNDATION & STRUCTURE

RCC framed structure.

PLASTERING

Internal: 18mm Thick double coat cement plaster with smooth finishing.
External: 20mm Thick double coat sand faced, water proof cement plastering.
Ceiling:12mm Thick single coat cement plastering.

JOINERY WORKS

Main Door: 8-ft height Teak wood frame and shutter with melamine polish and
hardware of good make.
Internal Doors: Hard wood frame with HDF Flush shutters along with standard
hardware of good make.
Windows: UPVC windows.

PAINTING

Internal: Smooth finish with luppum (Altek or equivalent)
External: Combination of texture and weather-proof paint

FLOORING

Great Room, Drawing, Dining areas: Marble finish
Bedrooms and other areas: Vitrified tiles
Balcony: Anti-skid ceramic tiles.
Utility & Wash: Anti-skid resistance tiles
Parking area: Paver blocks

TILE CLADDING & DADOING

Kitchen: Glazed tiles above the kitchen platform
Toilets: Best quality acid-resistant, anti-skid designer ceramic tiles up to 7'0
height.
Utility / Wash: Glazed ceramic tiles dado up to 3'0" height.

KITCHEN

1. Granite platform with single bowl & single drain stainless steel sink
2. Provision for exhaust fan

TOILETS

Granite/Indian marble under counter washbasin. Wall cascade EWC, provision for geyser and
exhaust fan, all CP fittings of premium make

ELECTRICAL

All standard common points (including AC)   TV socket in all bedrooms and living room.

TELEPHONE

Provision of telephone points in ground & first floor living areas and intercom provision from
Security for all villas


CABLE TV


TV points in bedrooms, living room , family and dining areas.

INTERNET

Provision for broadband connections & Wi-Fi

GENERATOR

Stand-by power for common amenities. 100% power back up for each individual unit.

WATER SUPPLY

24 Hours water supply through centralized hydro pneumatic system.

Doors						Main door in teak wood with teak veneer finish or equivalent, Internal doors-flush doors with Laminates or equivalent Windows: Teak wood windows				Flooring						Ceramic tiles in toilets, balconies and utility areas, marble flooring with skirting in all other areas.				Wall finishes						All interior wals with luppam finish and plastic emulsion paint, All external walls will be provided with cement based exterior paint. project_specification:
GeneralStructure :
RCC tamed structure. Super Structure :
Table moulded day! cement bricks. Basement Car Parking
Cement rendered flooring with grooves column crash guards for basement columns.

Door :
Main door India Teak wood frame and Teak wood shutter with hardware of reputed make Internal DOCIE Indian Teak wood frame & ready designed molded shutter with hardware of reputed make.

Toilet & Balcony Doors :
Indian Teak wood frame & ready designed molded shutter & hardware ofreputed make.

Windows & Ventilators
Teak wood/aluminum frames with float glass.

Flooring :
Marble / vitrified tiles for living, dining, bedrooms and kitchen. Anti-skid tiles in balcony & toilets. Flooring pattern with granite & marble for staircase & couldÂ°
Cladding:

Kitchen :
Granite tiles dado up 2' height above kitchen platform. Toilets :
Glazed ceramic tiles dado up to doors height Utilities /Wash Areas: Ceramic tiles dado up to 3' height

External :
Exterior emulsion paint with appropriate cladding as per elevation. Internal :
Luppam / putty finish with emulsion paint for walls.
Kitchen

Plaffrom: Granite platform with stainless steel sink Utilities / wash: Provision for washing machines.
Toilets :
Dining and m. bedroom toilets will consist of wash basin, EWC with flush tank, health faucet hot and cold wall mixer with shower, provision for geysers in m. bedroom & exhaust fan provision in all toilets. All fitting are chrome plated.

Electrical :
Concealed multi-stand copper wiring for entire flat. 15 amps power outlets in all the bedrooms kitchen. 5amps in bed room, dining and living 3-phase supply for each apartment and individual meter board, miniature circuit breakers (MCB) for each distribution boards Telephone points in m. bedrooms, living & intercom facility to all the units connecting to the security Provision for cable wires in living area & m.Bedroom.

Lift :
Automatic passenger lilts with rescue device with V3F for energy efficiency automatic stop at floor level in case of failure.

Generator :
100% DG set backup for common areas and lilts IKV DG power back-up.

project_specification:
GeneralSTRUCTURE
RCC framed structure

WALLS
6â€? thick solid cement concrete block for external walls and 4â€? thick solid cement block masonry for internal walls.

PLASTERING
All internal & external walls with smooth plaster finish

DOORS
Main door in teak frame with masonite skin moulded door shutter with melamine polishing and reputed make hardware, Internal doors in non teak wood frame and flush door shutters.

WINDOWS
UPVC Sliding doors with mosquito mesh Provision

FRENCH DOORS
UPVC door two tracks with float glass of 5mm thickness

FLOORING
Living, Dining and Bedrooms (24â€?x24â€?) vitrified tiles of standard make. Kitchen & balcony: (16â€?x16â€?) ceramic tiles of standard make; Bathrooms: acid resistant and anti skid ceramic tiles of standard make; Utilities/wash area: anti skid ceramic tiles (12â€?x12â€?) of standard make.

PAINTING
External: Regular texture paints and weather proof emulsion regular range Internal: Two coat putty, one coat primer two coat acrylic emulsion paints with roller finishing

AIR CONDITION
Provision for split A/C for all bedrooms.

CABLE T.V.
Provision for cable connection in all bedrooms and leaving room.

INTERNET
One internet point provision in each flat.

UTILITIES/WASH AREA
Provision for washing machine & wet area for washing utensils

WATER SUPPLY
Provision for municipal water

CORRIDORS
Vertified tiles (24â€?*24â€?)

DADOING
Glazed cermic tiles dado upto 2' height above kitchen platform.
Toilets (8â€?*12â€?) glazed ceramic tile dado of standard make upto 7'-0' height.

KITCHEN
Granite platform with stainless steel sink and provision. For fixing aqua guard

PLUMBING & SANITARY WARE
CP fitting of ESSESS / Jaguar or equivalent make in toilets and kitchen Cera, Johnson or equivalent make sanitary ware in all toilets Floor mounted EWC with flush tank of standard make Rectangular shape washbasin.
Hot Water connection for Master Bed room bathrooms from solar water heating system and other bathrooms provision for Geyser.

ELECTRICAL
Concealed copper wire of Anchor, Fine cab or equivalent make PVC conduits of sudhakar or equivalent make, Modular switches: Anchor Roma or equivalent make. TV Telephone points in living and master bedroom, AC power point in master bedroom.

LIFTS
4Nos of 6 passenger high speed passenger lift with V3F for energy efficiency.

POWER BACKUP
DG backup for lifts & common area, 5 points in each 2 BHK flat & 7 points in each 3 BHK flat.

SECURITY
The entire property is secured with a compound wall along with solar fencing and entrance will be manned by a security team.

project_specification: General	STRUCTURE	Structure designed with Load Bearing Concrete Shear Walls and Flat Slabs. Designed considering Earthquake Zone 3.		WALL FINISHES	Internal Walls/ Ceiling : Surfaces Luppam/ Putty and Painted with Acrylic Emulsion of Approved Color and Premium Brand.	External Walls: Weatherproof Elastomeric Paint of Premium Brand and Approved Color.		FLOORING	Vitrified Tiles Flooring in Drawing/ Living/ Dining/ Bedrooms/ Kitchen. Anti-skid Ceramic Floor Tiles in Bathrooms & Glazed Tile Dadoing up to 2100 mm.	 Granite Flooring and Italian Marble with Cladding on Lift Lobby & Italian Marble Flooring and Cladding in Ground	Floor Entrance Lobby.	Vitrified Tiles/ Marble/ Granite in all other common Areas/ Amenities/ Corridors.		DOORS AND WINDOWS	Main Door : Teak Wood Door with Melamine Polish. Brass/ SS Hardware with Night Latch, of superior brand.	Internal Doors : CP Teak Wood Door Frame with Membrane Pressed Shutters. UPVC Framed & Glazed (tinted) Sliding Doors in Balcony. UPVC Frame and Shutter for Toilets.	Windows : UPVC Framed & Glazed (tinted) Sliding/ Openable Shutters.		KITCHEN	Stainless Steel Sink with Granite Platform.	Glazed Tiles above the Kitchen Platform 60 mm high.	Provision for Piped Gas Connection.	Provision for RO Point.	Provision for Dishwasher.		ELECTRICAL INSTALLATION	PVC Insulated Wires of Superior Range in PVC Conduits.	Modular Switches of superior brand.	DBs with RCBO in each Apartment of Safety.	Separate Miniature Circuit Breaker (MCB) will be provided for Light & Power Circuit at Main Distribution Box within each Flat.	Lighting Arrester for the Tower.		TELEPHONE / DATA CONNECTION	TV Outlets in Master Bedroom and Living Room.	Telephone Point in all Bedrooms and Drawing Room with Parallel Connection.		AIR CONDITIONER	Provision for Split AC with Surge Protected Power Point and Pre-laid Drain Pipes for Living, and two Bedrooms.		SANITARY & PLUMBING	Sanitary Fittings: Ceramic Ware of superior brands like Hindware or equivalent.	Provision for Geyser in all the Bathrooms.	CP Fittings of superior brand like Jaguar or equivalent.		WATER SUPPLY PIPING	Superior Quality GI (external lines) / PPR or CVPC (internal line) Piping.		SANITARY AND RAINWATER PIPING	Superior Quality PVC Piping. 12 External Hand.		RAILING	MS Powder Coated Railing for Staircase and Balconies.		LIFTS	High Speed Lifts of superior range.		SECURITY SYSTEMS	Intercom Facility for Security System.		FIRE SAFETY	Fire Water Tank and Fire Pumps located at Basement & Terrace Level.	Fire Hydrant.	Automatic Sprinkler System at Basement, Lobby and Apartments.	Public Address System.	Portable Fire Extinguishers.		BACKUP GENERATOR	100% Backup Power including AC.		SEWAGE TREATMENT PLANT	All Waste Water from Kitchen, Toilet and Laundry will be treated as per the Pollution norms.

project_specification: GeneralStructure:RCC framed structureSuper structure:Red burnt brick in C.M. 9" thick external walls where structurally possible, 4Â½" Internal walls.Finishing:Plastering to ceiling and walls in C.M. with sponge finishingMain door:Medium Teak wood frame and laminated teak wood structure.Doors/Windows:All Dorr frames, Windows frames, Window shutters of medium teak. And door shutters of standard company of water proof flush type.Kitchen:Black granite platform with 2' height ceramic dado.Flooring:Vitrified Tiles of 2'0"x2'0 standard company make.Wardrobes:Provision in bedrooms and kitchenToiletsFlooring with ceramic tiles and ceramic dado up to 5'3". Common toilet with IWC and EWC in attached toilet will have washbasin one shelf and provision for geyser in master toilet.Wash Area3'0" height ceramic dado with washing machine point.Electrification:Common electrical points with concealed copper wiring with Anchor make Switches, 1 exhaust point, 1 geyser point, Two 15 amps, Two TV and telephone points in hall and Master Bed room shall be provided.Painting:Luppum / Smooth finish for all internal walls. Plastic emulsion for internal walls and Snowcem for external walls.Fixtures:Bath Room Fixtures and Sanitary fitting of I.S.I Standard make approved of standard quality.Hardware:Brass fittings for main door and aluminum for internal doors and windows.Glass:5mm thick pinhead glass as per the Architects design.Grills:As per the design of Architects.Note:Water, drainage and electricity deposits/ charges at an extra cost. Generator of adequate capacity for only common amenities (lift, water and Common areas lighting)

project_specification: General	Structure :	RCC framed structure | Ready mix concrete for slabs.		Super Structure :	Outer wall are of 9” & inner walls are of 4 ½ thick lightweight brick.		Painting :	Interior walls with smooth finishing, plastic emulsion Paint.	Exterior walls - good quality exterior pain ( Asian brand).		Common Area, Staircase & Corridor :	Good quality marble flooring, lift wall with granite or natural stone cladding.		Doors & Shutters :	All door frames in quality teak wood an shutters of good quality flush doors.		Windows :	All windows are anodized aluminum frames and shutters are of glazed sliding doors.		Flooring :	Vitrified tiles of Johnson / equivalent / natural stone.		Kitchen Platform:	Granite platform with 2' ceramic tiles dado.		Bathroom :	Quality branded tiles upto 7' height & quality acid cleaning anti-skid tiles for flooring.		Flooring :	Vitrified tiles of Johnson / imported or equivalent – 605*605 or 800*800.		Sanitary ware :	Branded quality sanitary ware Hindware / Parryware / Equivalent.		C.P. Fittings :	Branded quality C.P. fittings Mark / Jaguar / equivalent.		Electrical :	Concealed Copper wiring with adequate power plugs, fan points, light points, AC points, T V points with modular fittings.

project_specification: General	Structure   	R.C.C framed structure.		Super structure   	Light weight mud brick walls.	 	Plastering   	2-coat sponge finish plastering.	 	Main Door   	Teak wood frame and panel door with melamine polish and night latch.	 	Other Doors   	Teak wood frames with melamine polished teak veneer flush doors with knob locks.	 	Windows   	Teak wood window frames and shutters / NCL Seccolor windows fully glazed with pinhead glass and M.S. designer safety grills and     mosquito net shutters.	 	Hardware   	Standard aluminium hardware for all the doors & windows and brass fittings for main door.	 	Flooring   	2’ X 2’ designer vitrified tiles flooring in all areas with 4” skirting.	 	Kitchen   	Granite slab cooking platform with steel sink and 3’ height dado with 8”x12” design ceramic tiles. Power points for oven, aquaguard etc.	 	Toilets   	Ivory colour I.W.C./E.W.C. with flush tank and a wash basin in each toilet and 6’.6’’ height design ceramic tiles dado and anti skid tile flooring.	 	Electrical   	Concealed multi strand copper wiring with sufficient light and power points and provision for A/C in master bed room with standard modular switches.	   	Drainage   	PVC pipes and fitting for all drainage lines.	   	Water Supply   	Concealed CPVC pipe lines and fittings with standard C.P. fittings.	   	Painting   	Emulsion paint for internal walls with luppam finish in entire flat,	weather proof paints for external walls and smooth enamel paint for all wood surfaces and grills.	   	Lift   	Two nos of 6 passengers V3F lifts.	   	Generator   	Power backup for lifts, motors and common lighting.

project_specification: General	STRUCTURE:-	RCC framed structure.		SUPERSTRUCTURE:-	Table moulded clay / cement bricks.		BASEMENT CAR PARKING:-	Cement rendered flooring with grooves column crash guards for basement columns.		MAIN DOOR:-	Indian Teak wood frame and Teak wood shutter with hardware of reputed make.		INTERNAL DOORS:-	Indian Teak wood frame & moulded shutter with hardware of reputed make.		WINDOWS & VENTILATORS:-	Teak wood / UPVC frames with float glass.		FLOORING:-	Marble / vitrified tiles for living, dining, bedrooms and kitchen.	Anti-skid tiles in balcony & toilets.	Flooring pattern with granite / marble for staircase & corridors.		WALL CLADDING:-	Kitchen:- Ceramic tile dado up to 2' height above kitchen platform.	Toilets:- Glazed ceramic tiles dado up to door height.	Utilities / Wash Area:- Ceramic tiles dado up to 3' height.		PAINTING:-	External:- Exterior emulsion paint with appropriate cladding as per elevation.	Internal:- Luppam / putty finish with emulsion paint for walls.		KITCHEN:-	Platform:- Granite platform with stainless steel sink.	Utilities / Wash: Provision for washing machines.		TOILETS:-	Dining and master bedroom toilet will consist of wash basin, EWC with flush tank, hot and cold wall mixer with shower.	Exhaust fan provision in all toilets. Provision for geysers in master bedroom. All fittings are chrome plated.		ELECTRICAL:-	Concealed multi-strand copper wiring for entire flat.	15 amps power outlets in master bedroom, kitchen.	5 amps in other bedrooms, dining and living.	3-phase supply for each flat and individual meter board, miniature circuit breakers(MCB) for each distribution boards, telephone points in master bedrooms, living and intercom facility to all the units connecting to the Security.	Provision for cable wires in living area & master bedroom.		LIFTS:-	Automatic passenger lifts with rescue device with V3F for energy efficiency automatic stop at floor level in case of failure.		GENERATOR:-	DG Set for 100% power backup for common area and lifts.

project_specification:
GeneralFRAME WORK:
R.C.C framed structure.

WALLS:
Super structure in red bricks with two coats plastering with luppam finish in hall and bedrooms.

MAINDOOR:
Teak wood frame with polished teak wood paneled shutters with brass fittings.

DOORS/WINDOWS:
Teak wood frames for doors and windows with flush shutters.Teak wood shutters for windows.

KITCHEN:
Granite top platform with sink and granite tile dadoing upto 2”0 height.

FLOORING:
Vitrified tiles in all rooms.

PAINTING:
Internal: Emulsion Paint for all rooms.
Exteriors: Premium texture paint.

ELECTRICAL:
Concealed copper wiring with adequate light,fan and power plug for A/C,geyser,fridge,T.V,telophone computer points.

WATER SUPPLY:
GI/CPVC with standarad final fittings.

SHELVES:
shelves in kitchen and provision for other rooms.

TOILETS:
One indian WC,one european WC,and one wash basin of standard make,one in attached toilet one in dining with light colored vitreous sanitary ware,glazed tiles dado upto 6”0height in all toilets with ceramic flooring

project_specification: General	Structure    	RCC Framed Structure with Earthquake resistant design.		Walls    	230mm thick External Walls and 115mm thick Internal Walls with table Molded Brick.		Internal walls    	Smooth plaster surface treated with luppam/putty and painted with plastic emblusion.		Ceiling    	Cement plaster with smooth end finish and painted with plastic emblusion paint.		Texture paint    	Texture paint at Designated Area.		Glazed    	Creamictiles Dado upto 7'0' height.		Flooring	Living, Dinning, Kitchen, Bed rooms Balcony-2'-0"x2'-0"-Vitirited tiles Toilets-Antiskid ceramic tiles, Staircase and Landers-Natural stone floors Parking Area-Interlocking Paver titles/Cement Flooring.		Maindoor    	Teak wood paneled shutter with teakwood frame finished with melamine polish with good quality Hardware and suitable locking arrangement.		Internal doors	35mm thick One side veneered & other side painted Flush door Shutters with Teak wood frame fixed with good quality hardware.		Window	Window frame in medium teak wood with safety grills. Window shutters in medium teak wood with glazing.		Electrical	Concealed piping with copper wires and modular switches with adequate points for power and light. Television and Telephone points in living/Master Bed room/Study room/Lounge.		Bathroom	CP fitting of jaquar, EWC with special flush tank/wash basin etc, of Hindware or equivalent made.		Kitchen    	Granite slab plat form with stainless sink ceramic tile dado upto 2'0" above the courted.		Sanitary    	Superior quality PVC with special fittings as per relevant IS specifications.		Staircase    	Railing 1 meter height stainless steel Railing for Staircase.		Compound wall	Aesthetically designed 5' high wall plaster and painted with weather proof paint at rear and side of the building.

project_specification:
GeneralR.C.C. framed structure:
Footings. Columns. Beams and Slabs in Ready-mix concrete.

Superstructure:
Brick masonry with first class table molded light weight bricks in cement mortar.

Plastering:
Internal: Double coat cement plaster smooth finishing. Ceiling: Double coat cement plaster smooth finishing. External: Double Coat Sand faced cement Plastering.

Doors:
Main door Teak Wood door frame & vineer solid core flush shutter, aesthetically designed with polishing and designer hardware of reputed make.
Internal door: Teak Wood frame & Solid core flush shutter with both Sides painted of reputed make and Standard hardware.
Toilet: Teak Wood frame & Solid Core Rush Shutter With both Sides Painted of reputed make and Standard hardware.

Windows:
Window frames & Shutters of UPVC or equivalent material with glass & Standard hardware.

Painting:
Internal: Smooth finish With luppum or equivalent over a Coat of primer and top finish with two Coats of Plastic emulsion paint.
Ceiling: Smooth finish with luppum or equivalent over a Coat of primer and top finish with two Coats of Plastic emulsion paint.
External: Exterior emulsion paint of ISI specified make.

Flooring:
Drawing, Dining, Living, Foyer & Staircase: Vitrified tiles Bed rooms: Vitrified tiles.
Kitchen: Ceramic tiles.
Toilets I Utility area: Anti Skid Ceramic tiles.
Covered Terrace & Balconies: Ceramic tiles.

Tiles Cladding & Dadoing:
Kitchen Platform: Glazed ceramic tile dado up to TO height, above kitchen Malin
Toilets: Designer Make glazed ceramic tills dado upto lintel height.
Utility I Wash: Glazzed Ceramic tille

Kitchen:
Granite platform with Stainless Steel Sink & provision for
fixing Aquaguard. Provision for exhaust fan and chimney.

Water Supply & Sanitary Systems:
Water supply points in kitchen/ toilets as required.

Utilities/Wash:
Provision for washing machine & wet area for washing utensils etc.

Toilets:
All the toilets will consists of
a) EWC with flush tank of ISI mark.
b) Hot and cold wall mixer with shower.
c) Provision for geysers in all toilets.
d) All C.P. fillings are of Jaguar or equivalent make.

Electrical System:
Concealed copper wiring in conduits for lights, fan, plug and power plug points wherever necessary of Finecab 1 Elieys or equivalent make.
a) Power outlets for air-conditioners in all bedrooms.
b) Power outlets for gesysers in all bathrooms.
c) Owen plug for cooking range, refrigerator, microwave ovens, mixer & grinder in kitchen,
d) Plug points for refrigerator. Tv & audio systems etc. wherever necessary.
e) 20Amps 3-phase supply for each unit and individual meter boards.
Miniature Circuit Breakers(MCB) & ELC8 for each distribution board.
g) All electrical fittings of Anchor/ ELLEYS or eoulvalent make.

Communication System:
a) Telephone points & TV Points in master bed room and drawing area.
b) Provision for Cable TV service.
c) Intercom facility from flat to flat and flat to security. Lifts:
2 nos of standard make

Generator:
For common area and I point in each flat

project_specification: General	FOUNDATION/STRUCTURE:	Earthquake resistant RCC Frame work in accordance with IS: 456:2000 & 1893:2002.		WALLS:	200mm thick External Walls and 100mm thick Internal Walls with Light Weight Cement Concrete Blocks.		 WALL FINISHES:	INTERNAL WALLS/CEILING:	Smooth plastered surface treated with luppam/putty and painted with acrylic emulsion of approved color and brand.		EXTERNAL WALLS:	Sponge finished plaster admixed with water proofing compound and painted with weather proof cement paint of approved make and color.		 CLADDING / TEXTURE PAINT:	Sand stone / Slate stone cladding & Texture Paint at Designated Areas.		FLOORING:	Hard Wood Flooring and Skirting -Master Bed Room in Type 1 and Type 2 and Family Room Area in Type 1.	2’X2’ Vitrified Ceramic Tile Flooring in Drawing / Living / Dining / Kitchen / Other Bed Rooms with skirting.	Anti Skid Ceramic Tile flooring in Toilets, Balcony & Utility.	Ceramic Tile Dadoing upto Ceiling in Toilets & Utility.		 DOORS & WINDOWS:	Main Door:	Teak wood paneled shutter with teakwood frame finished with melamine polish with good quality hardware with suitable locking arrangement like Lockset or equivalent.		Internal Doors:	35mm thick One side Veneered & other side painted Flush door Shutters with Teak wood frame fixed with good quality hardware.	All Folding / Sliding / openable doors are with powder coated Aluminum Frame with plain float glass panels.		WINDOWS:	All Sliding / Casement windows are with Powder coated aluminum frame with plain float glass panels.		KITCHEN:	Aesthetically finished modular kitchen with polished granite platform, stainless steel sink, chimney, and hob and storage cabinets.		 ELECTRICAL INSTALLATIONS:	Automatic change over switch between normal and backup power. 100% Backup Power except for AC machines.	Flame retardant, low smoke medium duty PVC conduit with Finolex, L& T or equivalent.	Modular switches like Legrand, Toyoma or equivalent.		 TELEPHONE / DATA CONNECTIONS:	RJ45 outlet in Family and all bed rooms for internet connection.	RJ11 outlets in Drawing, Living, Kitchen, Family and all Bed rooms for telephone connection.	TV out lets in Living, Family and all Bed rooms.		 SANITARY & PLUMBING WORKS:	Sanitary Fittings:	Ceramic ware of superior brands like Toto or equivalent except maid’s toilet.	Shower cubicles with 8mm toughened glass in all bathrooms except maid’s toilet.	CP fittings of superior range like Toto or Equivalent in Toilets and Kitchen except maids toilet.		 WATER SUPPLY PIPING:	Superior quality CPVC piping with special fittings as per relevant IS specifications.		 SANITATY AND RAIN WATER PIPING:	Superior quality PVC with special fittings as per relevant IS specifications.		 STAIRCASE RAILING /EXTERNAL HAND RAILING:	1 metre high duco painted MS Railing for Staircase and Balconies.		TRELLIS:	Porch and trellis at Ground Floor Level:	Metal trellis covered with poly carbonate sheet		Other Trellis at First Floor level, Terrace and Roof level:	Reinforced cement concrete finished with sand faced plaster and painted with weather proof Cement paint.		 UNIQUE FEATURES:	Cement based Decorative tiles / Non-skid Ceramic tiles in Car Porch / Patios.	Each Tower will have the following :	Independent Security System	Laundry Area	Double Height Entrance Lobbies	Sky Lounges	Private Hanging Garden Decks (for designated flats only)	Basement Covered Car Parking	Centrix Central telecom exchange	Centralized Gas connection to individual kitchens

project_specification:
GeneralSTRUCTURE:
Reinforced cement concrete structure.

SUPER STRUCTURE:
Table moulded red brick with cement mortar.

INTERNAL FINISH:
Sponge finish with two coats altek luppam.

EXTERNAL WALLS:
Sponge finish with altek exterior paint.

MAIN DOOR:
Designed teak wood frames with panelled shutter with glossy finish with Godrej 2c lock.

INTERNAL FRAMES:
Teak wood frames with beading.

INTERNAL DOORS:
Hard wood skin doors for bed rooms with Godrej locks rests of the Doors. Doors with beading finish.

WINDOWS:
Powder coated aluminium window with plain glass for shutters and safety grills.

FLOORING:
Marble slabs in drawing & dining, Medium size marble in rest of the Area (i.e, Bed Rooms, Kitchen & Balcony’s) (or) Vitrified Tiles (2’ x 2’).

TOILETS:
Branded taps, Raasi or Cera sanitary fitting, Geyser provision with wash basin for attached toilets, Dadoo upto door level with concept model tiles,Western commode in attached toilets and Indian commode in common toilet, One wash basin in dinning hall.

KITCHEN:
Granites platfrom with stainless steel sink and 2’0” height tiles daddoing.

PAINTING:
Emulsion paint for Internal walls, Apex and Ace colors for exterior walls, Grey luppam finish for flush doors and window shutters with enamel paints.

ELECTRICAL:
Fine cap wiring, Metal boxes, Maru modular switches, Havells ’MCB’, 3 Phase Meter, A.C. points in M.Bedroom, Fridge points, Lights points, Fan points and Geyser points.

PVC FITTINGS:
Ashirwad PVC pipes with Standard ISI Fittings.

PARKING:
Standard Parking floor tiles.

STAIRCASE:
Green marble.

INTERCOM:
Intercom facility for all Villas connected to Security.

TV/TELEPHONE:
TV and Telephone points in Drawing / Living and M.Bedroom.

project_specification:
GeneralStructure:
Reinforced Cement Concrete (RCC) structur: [C S 5)

Super-structure:
first class light-weight table moulded bricks masonry

Plastering;
Cement mortar sponge finished for both external and internal walls

Joinery/Wood:
Main door: ‘teakwood frame and shutter. Aesthetically designed with melamine polishing, fixed with reputed brass/SS hardware fittings

Internal doors:
Teakwood frame with moulded skin-panelled shutters fixed with reputed brand hardware

Windows:
UPVC/Teakwood frame and shutter panels

Grills:
M.S Safety designer grills

Flooring:
Living,Dinning,Kitchen and bedrooms,Vitrified flooring
Toilets & Utility Anti - Skid Ceramic floor tiles
Corridors & Staircase Marble flooring with Granite
Dado & Cladding Bathrooms Glazedceramic tile dado

Kitchen:
glazed ceramic tile dado of 2.0’ above kitchen platform

Utility & wash:
Glazed ceramic tile upto 3.0’ height

Lifts:
Granite/Vitrified wall cladding

Kitchen:
Granite platform with built in stainless steel sink
Tap connection for both municipal and ground water
Provision for R/O filter
Water connection in wash area

Toilets:
EWC with flush tank of reputed make
Hot & Cold wall mixer for wash basin
Hot & cold mixer with shower
Fittings of chrome platted
False ceiling in all toilets

Paintings:
Internal: smooth luppum finish with plastic emulsion paint
External: combination of texture with external apex paint

Doors & windows:
Premier Enamel paint/Polish

Electrical Concealed multi strand copper wiring in conduit of standard make

Provision for split A/c in all bed rooms

Power plugs for all kitchen ware,and for washing machine utility

Sufficient power points for gadgets in bedrooms and living rooms

3 phase supply for each unit with individual meter board

Good quality modular switches

Telecom Telephone points in master bedrooms and living rooms

Internet Wi-Fi for apartment

Cable TV TV points in master bedrooms and living rooms

Lifts 1 Nos. of 6 passengers capacities each of standard make

Generator 24x7 Power Back Up (except for Power Plugs).

amenities_list: {u'Outdoor Games': u'Play Area', u'Recreation': u'Club House', u'Safety & Security': u'Security', u'Network & Connectivity': u'Intercom', u'Fitness': u'Gymnasium', u'Convenience': u'Maintenance Staff', u'Landscape': u'Landscaped Garden'}
project_specification:
GeneralStructure :
Basement, Stilt 5 floors RCC framed, Seismic Zone II compliant

Quality of Steel and Cement:
TMT Steel of premium brands
Premium brand of cement

Super Structure :
9” thick light weight brick masonry for external walls
4” thick light weight brick masonry for internal walls

Joinery:
a) Main doors and folding (collapsible) doors in Teak wood frame and Teak wood shutters with necessary Brass/ss hardware
b) Internal doors in Teak wood frame and flush shutters with one side Teak veneer with Brass/ss hardware.
c) Toilet Doors with sheeting on rear side in full height.
d) UPVC Sliding windows with plain glass, UPVC Ventilators with translucent glass in toilets and kitchen

Plastering :
Double coat Sponge finish for internal walls
Double coat sponge finish for External walls with water proof mixtures

Painting:
Two coats luppam finish with Birla Putty and painting in Royal Emulsion for internal walls
Corridor walls with Birla Putty and texture  (as suggested by Architects) with Asian Paints ACE  or equivalent

Flooring:
24” x 24” Vitrified tiles, (Johnson, Asian or similar quality)
Anti-Skid Ceramic tiles for bathrooms & Utility areas, (Johnson/ Asian or equivalent)

Finishes:
False ceiling in corridors and lift lobbies

Toilets:
Ceramic tiles dado up to 6’x6” height
EWC and wash basin in all toilet (Hindware / Parryware / Cera or equivalent)
Provision for geyser in all toilets
Provision for exhaust fan

Kitchen:
Black granite counter platform with stainless steel sink
Provision for plumbing points for sink and electrical points to accommodate modular kitchen
Cladding with glazed tiles above the kitchen platform up to 2 feet tiles for modular style
Provision for sink in utility / washing machine /with electrification
Provision for water purifier in kitchen

Electrical :
One TV point for halls and bedrooms
Telephone point in living room and master bedroom
Fire resistant electrical wires of Anchor /Finolex or equivalent
Elegant designer modular electrical Switches of Anchor/ Roma/Nw
Earth Leakage Circuit Breaker (ELCB) for each flat
MCB for each room and the main supply

Generator Back-Up:
DG power back-up for each apartment with Automatic change over switch.  Standby generator support for a fan and light in each room
Standby generator back-up for lights in common areas and lift

Water Supply:
Water supply with over head tank
Water sump on the northeast corner of site with CPVC pipes for water
All sewage and rain water lines are superior quality PVC pipes (Supreme/Prince/Finolex or equivalent)
All plumbing lines are pressure tested
All the CP fittings of Jaguar/Marc or equivalent

Security Systems:
Round-the-clock Security with intercom and reception lobby
Guests and visitors will be let in only after their Confirmation by the Individual apartment owner

Lifts:
Two lifts of 6 passengers capacity each of Johnson/OTIS /Kone  or equivalent.One service lift with V3F for energy efficiency of Johnson/OTIS/Kone or equivalent.

project_specification:
GeneralSTRUCTURE
RCC framed Structure.

SUPER STRUCTURE
9’ External wall and 4.5’ internal wall with first class moulded clay bricks in cement mortar

PLASTERING
Internal: Smooth finish with cement mortar
External: Sand faced(sponge finish) with cement mortar

WOOD WORK
Main Door Teak wood frame & shutter aesthetically designed with designer ISI Hardware of reputed make.

WINDOWS
Glazed aluminium windows with shutters & Safety grills.

FLOORING
Drawing/Dining/Kitchen/ all bedrooms-vitrified tiles of size(2x2) balconies/toilets-anti-skid tiles.

KITCHEN
Granite for cooking platform with stainless steel sink, ceramic tiles dadoing upto 2’0ht. Above the platform.

TOILETS
Glazed ceramic tiles dado up to 7 height and matching anti skid ceramic tiles for flooring.

PAINTING
Internal :Two coats paint over a luppam finished surface(Asian Brand)
Ceilling: Two coats of Acrylic emulsion paint over a luppam finished surface.
External: Apex(weather protected asian brand paint)

ELECTRICAL
Fire resistant electrical wire of Anchor, policab or equivalent make, Electrical switches of Anchor Roma or similar make. Split AC Power point provision in all bedrooms. Necessary changes for fitting service connections, transformers, panel board cost of meter and deposit to AP TRANSCO to be borne by Customer.

COMMUNICATION
Telephone: Two pair telephone points in master bedroom and living area.
Internet Provision for cable connection in Living & Two bedrooms.

LIFT
Capacity of 6 person of kone (or) equivalent.

WATER SUPPLY
Over head tank with provision for Bore Water & Municipal Water.

GENERATOR
100% power back up for lift, common areas 1 fan point,1 tube light for each flat

SECURITY SYSTEM
Intercom facility to all units connects to secutrity

PARKING
Adequate parking facility
