project_specification:
GeneralStructure
Earth Quake resistance Reinforced cement concrete structure.

Super Structure
All walls in red brick work in cement mortar. 9” thick outer walls & 4 ½” thick internal walls.

Plastering Internal & External
12mm thick. “Cement plaster with smooth finishing” on internal walls and ceiling.
18mm thick, double coat sand faced cement plastering on external walls.

Doors
Main door teak wood frame & teak wood shutter (Sun Arc Co.) with reputed hardware fittings & melamine finish.
(Oswal Co.)
Internal doors teak wood frame and hardcore filled pre pressed shutter of reputed make, with one side veneer, one side paint and fitted with standard hardware.

Windows/Sliding Doors
Two track Aluminum frames with reflected glass with safety grills.

Interiors
POP ceiling borders in halls, bedrooms, kitchens, toilets.
Staircase / Balcony
Stainless Steel railings with marble flooring on stairs / corridors and vitrified tiles flooring in balcony and sit outs. (vitrified tiles from Loranzo Co.)

Painting
Internal walls & ceiling, living dining and bedrooms, kitchen & toilets with smooth putty finish with Acrylic paints and external walls with combination of texture & luppum finish with Apex Ultima paints as per architectural design.

Flooring
Complete vitrified tiles in flats area.
Anti skid matt finish tiles in Balconies & Sit outs.
Marble throughout the corridor and staircase with S.S. Railings.

Toilets
Toilets Flooring with antiskid & acid resistant tiles.
Designer wall tiles upto 7” feet height.

Utility & Wash Area
Glazed ceramic tiles dado upto 4’ feet height wherever applicable & anti skid tiles on flooring.

Kitchen
Polished granite cooking platform with stainless steel sink, dadoing ceramic tiles upto 3’ feet height above the platform.

Sanitary Fittings
Concealed GI piping with all sanitary ware: (Oswal Co.)
Washbasins with granite platform & basin mixers.
Latest imported cascade built-in one piece European WCs. In all attached toilets.
Good quality Indian WCs in common toilets.
Bathroom Wall mixers with shower & spout, including cold & hot water facility.
Provision for geyser & exhaust fans in all toilets and kitchens.
Standard Quality CP fittings. (KAG Co.).

Electrical Fittings
Concealed copper wiring in conduits for lights, fans, plug & power plug points wherever necessary of standard make. (copper wiring from Fincab Co. and Electrical Switches from Maru / Miracle Co. or equivalent) (PVC supply from Sudhakar Pipes / Prince Co.).
Power outlets for Air Conditioners in all bedrooms, living & dining area.
Power plug for cooking range chimney, refrigerator, micro over, mixer, grinders in kitchen.
Plug points for regrigerator, T.V. & Audio systems etc..wherever necessary.
Concealed AC copper wiring and drain pipe for fixing of Indoor A.C. units.
Miniature Circuit breaker (MCB) & ELCB for each distribution board.

project_specification:
GeneralSTRUCTURE:
Reinforced cement concrete.
 
SUPER STRUCTURE AND PLASTERING:
Table moulded brick walls with external 9" and internal 4.5".
All internal and external wall with 2 coats smooth sponge finish.
 
DOORS & SHUTTERS:
Main door frame with teakwood frame and teakwood shutter with necessary designed   
brass fittings. Internal doors teakwood frames and flush shutters are fitted with   
necessary branded finings.
 
WINDOWS:
UPVC window system.
 
BALCONIES:
French doors with glass and safety grills in UPVC.   
ceramic tiles flooring with skirling.
 
UTILITY:
Non-skid ceramic flooring and ceramic tiles for walls up to 3ft, standard ceramic tiles.   
Wet area for washing utensils etc., provision for washing machine.
 
KITCHEN:
Granite platform with steel sink. Wall tiles cladding up to 2' above platform provision   
for exhaust fan and chimney. Two water connections one for bore water and other for   
municipal water with Aqua guard provision.
 
SANITARY:
Non skid ceramic tiles for flooring and 7' height ceramic tiles for wall cladding.   
Indian or European commode matching with tiles, standard linings and provision   
for geyser in toilets.
 
PAINTING:
Luppam on internal walls in all rooms, balconies and toilets.   
Internal walls will be painted with Acrylic emulsion.   
External walls will be painted with cement based paint.

ELECTRICAL:
Concealed P.V.C. pipes with I.S.I standard copper wiring with adequate points with standard copper wiring modular, swiiches with metal box.
TV / Phone point in hall / drawing and all bedrooms AC points in all bedrooms and halls. Earthing for all A/C. as per requirement. Mixer / grinder / Oven/ refrigerator points In kitchen.
 
FLOORING:
Vetrified tiles flooring with skirting in hall & dining, bedrooms and kitchen or vanmora / somany or standard make.
 
WATER SUPPLY:
24 hrs of water supply from bore well.
Water softener shall he provided to reduce the hardness of the bore water.
 
SECURITY:
Intercom security from all the flats to central security.  
Video door phones are provided for security.
 
GENERATOR BACK-UP POWER:
All lights and fan points of the flats, corridor & lifts shall be operating with generator during power failure, except plug poinis like AC. Refrigerator, etc.
 
ELEVATORS:
Elevator of 8 Passengers Capacity is planned with standby Generator.  
 
VAASTHU:
All the flats are planned as per perfect vaasthu.

Two coats of cement plastering with sponge finish with Altech Putty finished smooth.External - Two coats of cement plastering with sponge finish with Grooves etc as per design details.FlooringRooms - Living, Dinning, Bedroom & Kitchen with good quality vitrified ceramic tiles of approved color and reputed make.Toilets, Wash/Utility - Acid resistant Anti-skid Ceramic Tiles.Kitchen - Glazed Ceramic Tiles dado of reputed make up to 2' 0' height above the kitchen platform.Parking - Pre cast concrete patterned blocks laid to slop.Tile DadoKitchen - Glazed Ceramic Tiles dado of reputed make up to 2' 0' height above the kitchen platform.Toilets - Glazed Ceramic tile dado of reputed make up to the lintel height.Wash/ Utility - Glazed Ceramic Tiles dado up to 5'0" height above the floor level.Kitchen / UtilityPlatform And Sink - Polished granite platform with stainless steel sink of reputed make.Water Connections - Bore and Municipal water connection with a provision for fixing and online drinking water UV purifying system.Exhausts - Provision for exhaust fan and chimney.Cabinets - Provision for cabinets.Utility - Landry facility with all necessary water, electrical and drain provision.ToiletsSanitary Fittings - All toilets shall consist of a counter top washer basin, a EWC with a flush tank of reputed make.Taps - CP Fittings of HOT and COLD water mixer with shower, ablution tap and a tap for WB, of reputed make.ElectricalMain Distribution Point - 3 Phase supply with copper cabling for each unit with Meter Board, necessary MCBs of reputed make.Bedrooms - Plug Points for TV and Audio system etc, and switches of reputed make 25 amp Power outlets for AC in all bedrooms, 5 amp plug points for TV & Audio systems etc All the necessary light and fan points shall be as per the design.Kitchen - 15 amp power outlets for cooking range, chimney, refrigerator, Microwave, ovens, mixers/grinders and all the necessary lights and fan points shall be as per the design.Toilets - 15 AMP Power plugs outlets for geysers in all toilets.Exteriors - project_by: By Rami Reddy Constructions in Attapur
project_specification:
GeneralSTRUCTURE: 

Still   4 floors RCC-framed, seismic zone II compliant.
Quality of Steel and Cement: 
TMT steel of premium brands. Premium brand of cement

Super Structure: 

9" thick AAC block / Red brick masonry for external walls. 4" thick AAC block / Red Brick masonry for internal walls.

DOORS: 

Main doors in teakwood frame and veneer-clad designed flush shutters with necessary Brass / SS hardware. Internal doors in teakwood frame and veneer-clad designed flush shutters of Brass / SS hardware. Toilets doors with PVC sheeting on rear side in full height.

WINDOWS: 

UPVC windows and UPVC French doors with plain glass with provision for mosquito mesh UPVC ventilators with translucent galss in toilets.

PLASTERING: 

Double-coat sponge finish for internal walls. Double-coat sponge finish for external walls.

PAINTING: 

Two coats of luppam finish with NCL Altech putty and emulsion paint for internal walls. External wall with Birla putty and / or texture (as suggested by architects) with Asian Paints ACE or equivalent

FLOORING: 

24" X 24" vitrified tiles (Johnson / Asian or similar quality). Anti-skid ceramic tiles for bathrooms and utility areas (Johnson / Asian or equivalent).

FINISHES: 

False-ceiling in corridors and lift lobbies.

TOILETS: 

Ceramic tiles dado up to 6' X 6' Height. EWC and wash basin in all toilets (Hindware / parryware / Cera or equivalent). Provision for geyser in all toilets. Provision for exhaust fan. All CP fittings of Jaquar / Marc or equivalent.

KITCHEN: 

Black granite counter platform with stainless stell sink from Nirali or equivalent make. Provision for plumbing points for sink and electrical points to accommodate modular kitchen. Cladding with glazed tiles above the kitchen platform up to 2 feet height. Provision for washing machine with electrification in utility area. Provision for water purifier in kitchen.

Electrical: 

a) One Tv point each for hall and master bedroom .
b) Telephone point in living room and master bedroom.
c) Fire-resistant electrical wires of Anchor / Finolex or equivalent.
d) Elegant designer modular electrical switches of Anchor / Roma / Legrand or equivalent.
e) MCBs for rooms and the main supply.


Generator Back-up: 


Common Areas: Lift, bore motors, corridor and staircase lights, parking area lights, servant room and security room.
For Flats: Lights , fans, mobile charging / computer point and TV point in the hall.

Water Supply: 

a) Water Supply from bore well, with overhead tank and water sump with CPVC pipes of Ashirwad or equivalent for water.
b) Drinking water supplied by HMWSSB will be stored in sump and overhead tank and supplied through a tap connection in kitchen 
c) All sewage and rain water lines are of superior quality PVC pipes (Supreme / Prince / Finolex or equivalent).

Security Systems: 

Round-the-clock security with intercom. Guests and visitors will be let in only after confirmation with individual apartment owner.

LIFT: 

6-passenger capacity V3F lift of Johnson / OTIS / Kone or equivalent.

PLASTERING : All internal walls with 2 coats smooth sponge finish plastering 1:6 in cement mortar with luppam putti finish. All external walls with 2 coats smooth sponge finish plastering in cement mortar.															DOORS : All door frames of granite, molded shutter for main door & flush shutters for all other doors.											WINDOWS : Aluminum windows with glass and safety grills.																					JOINERY FOR DOORS & WINDOWS : Brass.																								FLOORING : Granite in hall, wooden flooring in master bed room & vitrified tiles in remaining area (with skirting).																	ELECTRICAL : Concealed copper wiring, fan point, bulb point, tube point, 5 amps socket, AC provision in each room and																			power point in kitchen and hall, bell point in hall. Modular switches electrical backup for common lights, lift																					& bore well.																																				WATER SUPPLY : Bore and municipal water																																							SANITARY FITTING : Good quality C. P. fitting of ISI standard. WALL CLADDING KITCHEN & TOILET : Tiles upto 6’ height in toilets, and in Kitchen 2’6” height above the platform.																																																LOFT : Loft will be provided in kitchen and 1 in bed room. project_specification:
Generalstructure V.R.C.C. Framed Structure.

Super Structure & Plastering:-
First Class Brick Masonry / Light weight brick / solid cement Blocks/ AAC light brick/ other equivalent.
Two coats of plastering with sponge finish.doors Main Door: Teak Wood Door frame and shutter in combination of teak wood and teak ply, aesthetically designed with melamine polishing, designer hardware of reputed make with night latch, safety lock and magic eye.

Internal Doors: Good quality Teak wood Frames, moulded door shutters with SS fittings.windows UPVC Windows with sliding shutters & Float Glass. MS grill with stain enamel paint fixed in wall.flooring 2'x2â€² Vitrified Tiles for Living, Dining and Bedrooms. Kitchen, Balconies & Bathrooms: Antiskid, acid resistant Ceramic Tiles.kitchen Tiles cladding & Dadoing:
Kitchen:
Glazed Ceramic tiles Dado 2â€²-0â€? height above platform.
Utilities/Wash: Glazed Ceramic Dado upto 4â€²-0â€? height.wall_finishing Painting:
External: Combination of Textured and Apex Paint of Asian / ICI or equivalent make over One coat of premier.

Internal walls: Lappam finish with good quality putty over a coat of premier finished with two coats of Emulsion Paint.

Internal doors: One coat of wood primer and two coats of Satin enamel paint.

Kichen: Granite platform with Stainless Steel sink with municipal and bore water connection and provision for fixing of Aqua-guard.toilet_fittings In all Bed Rooms Cascade type EWC with Flush tank and Wash basin with half pedestal of Simpola/Hindustan or equivalent make in toilets and dado upto 7â€².0â€³ height. Hot and Cold water mixer with shower. Provision for geyser in all toilets. All C.P Fittings and chrome plated of jaquar or Plumber or equivalent make.electrical Concealed copper wiring of Anchor/Polycab or Equivalent make & DB Box.
Power points for Air-conditioners in all Bedrooms, Cooking range, Chimney, Refrigerator, Mixers and Microwave oven etc., in kitchen.others Utilities/Wash:
Provision for washing machine & wet area for washing utensils etc.

Water Supply & Sanitation:
ISI Mark & HDPC/UPVC/CPVC piping for water supply (Concealed).
ISI mark PVC or equivalent Sanitary piping.

Switches:
Northwest/Anchor or equivalent make.

Communication:
Telephone points in living areas.

Internet:
One Internet provision for each flat.

Cable connection:
Provision for cable connection in Living room & Master Bedroom.

Staircase & Lobby:
Marble/Granite Flooring and MS/RCC for Staircase Railing.

Elevators:
Elevators of 8 persons Johnson/Otis or equivalent make with V3F & Granite cladding. For lift entrances.

Generator :
D.G. set backup for common areas, Lifts, Water Pumps and 7 points in 2BHK & 9 points 3BHK.

Power Plugs for all kitchen ware and for washing machine in Utility

project_specification:
GeneralStructure

FoundationsRCC FootingsStructureRCC framed structure

Wall_finishing

WallsExternal exposed walls 9"? thickness , internal walls 4.6" thickness with quality brunt brick / Aerocon fly ash block & cement mortar of two coats with sponge finish.

Flooring

Vitrified tile flooring size 2x2 in all rooms and antiskid ceramic flooring in balconies and wash areas, Granite flooring in corridors and staircase areas.

General

PaintingLuppam finishing for internal walls and ceiling with ASIAN premium emulsion pains and ASIAN ACE for external walls, BIRLA wall care putty/textures finish for other walls.Water SupplyBore well through overhead tank supply and one connection for drinking water in the kitchen.JoineryMAIN DOOR Teak wood frame and designer panelled shutter with good quality hardware and GODREJ or EUROPA make locks.INTERNAL DOORS: Teak wood frames with veneer / imported skin doors with standard hardware & Locks.WINDOWS: UPVC Windows of APARNA or equivalent make with fly screen and MS safety grills.GeneratorFill power back0up (except a.c and geyser).(MAHINDRA/ASHOK LEYELAND make)NOTEVAT,Registration& service tax applicable as per govt.norms

Kitchen

Black granite kitchen platform with stainless steel sink,2' dadoing with glazed tile above granite kitchen platform,provision for water purifier and washing machine,power points for grinder,fridge,oven etc.

Plumbing

All water pipes lines are CPVC pipes of ASTROL / ASHIRWAD make, sewer lines for external of PVC SUDHAKAR make.

Electrical

Concealed PVC pipes and copper wiring with all necessary points for lights, fans, etc. Telephone points in hall and master bedrooms, T.V. & A.C. points in all bedrooms, all switches / sockets are LEGRAND / ANCHOR / NORTHWEST etc. Wires of FINOLEX for A.C. and Geysers and rest all with HAVELLS / FONECAB etc.

Toilet_fittings

ToiletsAntiskid ceramic flooring and glazed tiles dado up to 7' height and good quality sanitary fittings(CERA / PARRYWARE / HINDWARE), along with good quality CP fittings (JAGUAR / GROHE or equivalent).

Lift

Elevator6nos 6-passengers lift of standard make.

project_specification:
GeneralFoundation and structure
RCC framed structure designed for earthquake resistance Zone, stipulating to National Building Code Standards.

Internal Walls/ceiling
4" thick solid bricks for internal walls, Luppam /Putty finish with acrylic emulsion paint of premium brand. Low roof in all bathrooms.

External Walls
8" thick solid bricks for external walls having heat proof & resistant to moisture penetration characters in cement mortar. / RCC frame structured external walls. With weather proof Acrylic paint of premium brand. Cladding as per elevation

Plastering
Internal: Single coat with sponge finish, External: Double coat with sponge finish

Wood work
Main Doors: Teakwood frame & HDF skin moulded panelled door with melamine polishing and designer hardware of reputed make.
Internal doors: Teakwood frame & HDF skin moulded panelled door with paint finish and designer hardware of reputed make.
French doors: UPVC door frame with float glass panelled shutters and designer hardware of reputed make
Windows: UPVC window system with float glass with suitable finishes as per design.
Kitchen: :Granite platform with stainless steel sink and provision for fixing water purifier, Provision for cabinets, exhaust fan & chimney Centralized piped gas connection.
Utilities / Wash: Provision for washing machine & wet area for washing utensils, etc

Tiles cladding
Dadooing in kitchen : Glazed ceramic tiles, dado up to 2'-0" height above kitchen platform
Bathrooms : Glazed ceramic tiles dado of 2 x 1 imported tiles up to door height
Utilities/Wash : Glazed ceramic tiles dado up to 3'-0" height

Flooring
Drawing, dining rooms: Designer Vitrified Tiles.
Bathrooms: Anti skid ceramic tiles
Combination of marbles flooring for corridors, lobbies and stair cases,
Combination of designed cement tiles and cement flooring in parking areas

Painting
External : Two coats exterior acrylic emulsion paint of premium brand over one coat of primer
Internal : Smooth wall putty finish with acrylic emulsion paint of Premium Brand over a coat of primer, OBD for common areas parking and stilt floors

Toilets
All the toilets with Granite counter top wash basin with hot and cold basin mixer value.
Wall hung EWC with flush value.
Hot and cold water mixer with shower.
Full size wall mirror at wash basin.
Bath tub in master bed room.
Provision for geyser in all toilets.


Sanitary and rain water pumping
Superior quality PVC/GI piping with special fitting as per IS specification.
All plumbing points to be pressure tested as per standards.

Electrical
Concealed copper wiring of Premium brand Power outlets for air conditioners in all bedrooms, living rooms and dining rooms. Power outlets for geysers in all bathrooms, Power plug for cooking range chimney, refrigerator, microwave, oven, mixer/ grinders in kitchen.
3 phase supply for each unit and individual meter boards, Miniature Circuit Breakers (MCB) for each distribution board of reputed make. Switches reputed make.

Security System
Round the clock security system with C.C. cameras and intercom from all flats connecting to security

Fire Safety
Fire water tank & fire pumps located at basement & terrace level Fire hydrant for greater safety, Automatic sprinkler system at basement lobby and apartments, Intelligent addressable fire detection & alarm system, Public address system, Portable fire extinguishers..

Back - up Generator
DG set acoustically insulated with 100 % backup power for flats except for A/C and geysers, Uninterrupted power supply for lifts and water pumps and selected common area lighting

Sewage treatment
Sewage Treatment Plant, All waste water from kitchen, bath and laundry wash will be treated and re-used for gardening

Telecom
Telephone points in master bedroom, children room & living areas
Intercom facility to all the units connected to security, Laundry & Stores

Cable T.V
Provision for cable connection in master bedroom & living room

Internet
Internet provision in each apartment. Wi-Fi enabled for the whole community

Lifts
High speed automatic passenger lifts with automatic doors & rescue device with V3F (Variable Voltage, Variable frequency Drive) for energy efficiency with granite/vitrified cladding.
Freight lift with V3F for energy efficiency for each tower, entrance with granite/vitrified cladding.
Lifts each catering to 20 flats in every block.

Windows	Steel Window pre-painted Anodized Aluminum Ventilation : Fixed louvers.		Flooring & Skirting     	Main Walls: Ceramic tiles of Kazaria / Johnson	Toilets: Non-skid ceramic tiles of Kazaria / Johnson	Corridors & Staircase: Polished Shahabad stones	Colouring on Internal Walls & Ceiling    	Altek superfine (Luppum with Plastic Emulsion Paint).		Colouring on External Walls     	Altek harmoney acrylic Emulsion Paint (External Grade).		Paintings on doors & shutters    	Synthetic enamel painting.		Dadoo    	Bathroom tiles dadooing: With colour glazed tiles upto 6'6" (i.e. upto lintel level)		Kitchen    	Polished granite platform steel sink, Dadoing with strip tiles up to door level and provision for exhaust fan.		Cupboards and Shelves    	RCC		Super Structure    	Fly-ash brick masonry.		Finishing    	Internal lappam. External Dubara.		Bathroom Fittings    	Good quality bathroom fittings.		Painting    	Interior: Emulsion Paints. Exterior: Weather-proof paints.		Flooring    	Ceramic Flooring. DB's with MCB isolators.

project_specification: General	Structure:	RCC framed structure.		Walls:	Standard bricks in cement mortar (all external walls 9" and internal walls 4 ½" thickness)		Finishing:	Sponge finishing in cement mortar for exterior and smooth finish for interior surfaces		Painting:	2 coats smooth Lappam finish with plastic emulsion for internal walls and exterior quality paint for external walls.		Doors:	Main door frame in teak wood	Main door shutter in teak with polish and	Remaining door frames in saal wood with flush door shutters with enamel paint.		Windows:	Main window frame in Teak wood, remaining window frames in saal wood and all shutters with teak wood along with MS safety grills & glass panel with enamel paint		Flooring:	Marble flooring (Slabs) in Hall, Marble flooring (tiles) in bedrooms and kitchen.		Kitchen:	Polished green marble cooking platform with stainless steel sink, ceramic tile dado up to 2 feet above platform		Toilets:	Anti-skid ceramic tile flooring & ceramic tile dado up to 6 feet	Concealed Plumbing with quality CP fittings.		Electrical:	Concealed copper wiring with adequate points with ISI wires and modular Switches.		Water Supply:	Water Supply through bore well and overhead tank

project_specification:
GeneralSTRUCTURE:

R.C.C. framed structure designed for zone II regulations.


WALLS:

4â€³ and 6â€³ solid concrete blocks for both internal and external walls.


WINDOWS:

Aluminium powder coated windows with MS safety grills, enamel painted as per architects drawing and colour.


Doors:

Main door & Pooja door of teak wood frames and teak veneered polished shutters. Internal door frames of Sal wood with painted shutters.


FLOORING & DADDOING:

2ft.x2ft. Premier vitrified tiles for the entire flat. Glazed tiles to a height of 7 ft. in toilets and 2 ft. cladding in kitchen above cooking platform. Antiskid tiles for utilities and balconies.


KITCHEN:

Granite counter top with stainless steel sink.

ELECTRICAL:

Finolex wires with Anchor Roma Switches.


TV & TELEPHONE

One point each in the living room & the master bedroom.


PLUMBING AND SANITARY

na


LIFT:

One 8 passenger automatic lift.


POWER BACK UP

24 hrs power backup for common areas.


 PAINT:
Tractor emulsion for the internal walls. Enamel paint for grill railings and doors. Exterior emulsion for the Exterior wall from asian paints.

project_specification: General	Framed Structure	 R.C.C. framed structure	 	Super Structure Brick	 Masonry in Cement Mortar.	 	Plastering  	 Internal/External Single coat of plastering to internal walls and ceiling.	 Two coats of plastering for External walls.	 Main Door Teak Wood frame with moulded paneled shutter doors with Melamine polishing and reputed make fittings.	 Windows UPVC Windows system with Float Glass with suitable finishes as per design.	 Grills M.S.Enamel painted, aesthetically designed and fixed to wall.	 	Painting  	 External Two Coats exterior Acrylic Emulsion Paint of reputed make over one coat of primer.	 Internal Smooth Putty finish with Acrylic emulsion paint of reputed make over a coat of primer.	 	Flooring/Tile Cladding  	 Living, Dining Bedroom, Kitchen 24" x 24" Vitrified Tiles.	 Bathrooms Anti-skid Ceramic Tiles of reputed make.	 Staircase Kota Stone Flooring.	 Dadooing in Kitchen Glazed Ceramic Tiles dado up to 2'-0" height above kitchen platform of reputed make.	 Bathrooms 8" x 12" Glazed Ceramic Tile dado of reputed make up to 7'-0" height.	 Utilities / Wash 8" x 8" Glazed Ceramic Tile dado up to 3'-0" height of reputed make.	 	Kitchen	 Granite Platform with Stainless Steel Sink and treated water supply at one point.	 Provisions for fixing of Water Purifier, Exhaust Fan and Chimney.	 	Toilets	 Granite Counter Top wash basin only in Master Bedrooms.	 Cascade with flush tank of Hindustan / Parry or equivalent make.	 Hot and cold wall mixer with shower.	 Provision for Geysers in all Toilets.	 All C.P.fittings are chrome plated of Jaquar make.	 	Electrical	 Concealed copper wiring in conduits for lights, fans and power plug wherever necessary of Finolex / Anchor or equivalent make.	 Power outlets for Air Conditioners in all bedrooms.	 Power outlets for Geysers in all Toilets	 Power plug for cooking range chimney, refrigerator, microwave ovens, mixer / grinders in kitchen.	 Plug points for Refrigerators, T.V. wherever necessary.	 3-Phase supply for each unit and individual Meter Boards.	 Miniature Circuit breakers (MCB) & ELCB for each distribution board of reputed make.	 All electrical fittings of Anchor Roma or Equivalent make.	 	Tele-communication	 Telephone points in all bed rooms, living & dining areas. Four pair cables to all the units.	 Intercom facility to all the houses connecting from Security.	 	Cable TV and Internet	 Provision for Cable Connection in all Bed rooms & Living Room.	 Provision for Internet Connection in one Bed room.

General
	Structure:
	R.C.C. framed structure
	Â 
	Superstructure:
	Light weight brick in Cement mortar with 9' external walls and 4.5'' internal walls
	Â 
	Plastering:
	Internal double coat oement plaster with Birta white putty flish
	External double coat sponge finish cement mortar with front side texture finish
	Â 
	Main Door:
	Indian Teak wood frames and shutter with Brass fittings
	Â 
	Internal Doors:
	Indian Teak wood frames with one side teak veneer flush doors
	Â 
	Windows:
	UPVC Windows
	Â 
	Flooring:
	2'*2' vitrified tiles for drawing. living, dinning. bedrooms and balconies Anti- skid ceramic ties tor bathrooms, kitchen and utility (Jhonson or Kajaria make)
	Â 
	Kitchen:
	Granite platform with stainless steel sink 3' height Dado with glazed tiles
	Â 
	Utitity / Wash:
	Glazed ceramic tiles dodo upto 3' height provision for washing Machine
	Â 
	Painting:
	Internal doors and windows one side polished and other side painted internal walls with Plastic Emulsion External walls with Apex or equivalent make (Asian Paints)
	Â 
	Electrical:
	Adequate power and lighting points with concealed copper wiring with Modular Switches
	Â 
	Lifts:
	Six passenger capacity lifts will be provided
	Â 
	Generator:
	Generator for lifts, common lights, and two points in each flat (Mahindra or Kirloskar make)
	Â 
	Prking area:
	Cement based tiles over PCC bed

project_specification:
GeneralFrame work 
Reinforced Cement Concrete

Super Structure 
Flyash Bricks
Out side walls 9” thick
Internal walls 4.5” thick

Doors
Main door with teak wood frames & teak wood shutters
Designer internal flush doors with teak woodframes
Top quality fittings on all doors.

Windows 
UPVC Window systems.

Electrical
Concealed copper wiring with adequate points for TV, Exhaust Fans, Geyser, AC etc., MCB will be provided in all apartments.
Standby generator shall be provided.
Wiring Make:Polycab
Switches Make :Legrand

Flooring
Johnson / Euro Tiles or equivalent make

Sanitary
Colored Ceramic tiles up to 7 ft height
Concealed Pipeline, Ivory colored Washbasin
Colored Indian or European commode matching with tiles, standard fittings and provision for Geyser in Toilets.
Bath Tub will be provided in the master bed room toilets as planned
Tiles Make :Johnson Tiles or Equivalent Brand
Basins Make :Parry ware /Cera or Equivalent Brand
Standard Fittings:Jaguar

Plastering
Smooth finish to internal walls.
Sponge finish to external walls.

Painting
Plastic emulsion with NCLAltek or Luppam on Internal walls
Cement paint on external façade.
Front elevation with RENOVO texture paint.
Reinforced Cement Concrete

Kitchen
Granite platform with sink.
2 ft height Dado with tiles above the counter.
Provision for exhaust fan and suitable electrical points for kitchen appliances.

Generator / Backup Power
All lights and fans points of the apartments and corridor shall be operating with the Generator during power failure except plug points like AC, Refrigerator, etc., (Capacity of Generator will depend on the number of apartments).

Elevators
Elevators of 6 or 8 passengers capacity as planned with stand by Generator.
Lift make: Johnson lifts

Telephone & Television
Telephone points and Cable TV point shall be provided in living and all bedrooms.

Water Supply
24 hours water supply from Bore well, in addition to municipal water supply with the help of storage tanks of suitable capacity.
Water Softener shall be provided to reduce the hardness of the bore water.

Common Areas
Corridor and staircase are with marble/granite flooring
Corridor is provided with false ceiling.
Upto 8 ft height tile cladding for corridor walls.

Security system
Door video cameras are provided at each apartment forsecurity purpose.

project_specification:
GeneralSTRUCTURE 

• R.C.0 framed structure with seismic resistant design Bharathi Cement & Sree / Sarwotham High yield TMT steel. 

SUPER STRUCTURE 

• External 9" and Internal of 4 %" thick walls with light weight red brick in cement mortor. • Compound wall with solid cement brick. 

PLASTERING 

• Internal Two coats, with sponge finishing. • External Two coats, with sponge finishing. 

DOORS AND WINDOWS 

• Main Door : Frame and Shutters with Best Teak Wood with S.S. fittings. 
• Internal Doors : Medium teak wood frames with design flush door shutters with painting and S.S. fittings. 
• Windows : All windows are UPVC with glass doors and safety iron grills. 

FLOORING 

• Vitrified tiles of 24"x24" size of branded company for Hall, Dining, Bed Rooms kitchen and balcony. 
• External flooring within the compound wall is of PCC flooring, and Parking Tiles in Drive Ways. 
• Common area and steps with Marble/granite with 18 gauge Stainless Steel Railing of regular design. 

KITCHEN 

• Granite platform with Stainless Steel sink with Granite/ the dado up to 2' height. 
• Provision for exhaust fan/Chimney. 
• Separate taps for bore well water and drinking water. • Provision for water filter. 

TOILETS 

• All toilets with Anti skid ceramic tile flooring and 6' 6" wall cladding with digital tiles of branded company. 
• WC or EWC in attached toilet and Indian WC in common toilet of branded company. • Hot and cold wall mixture with shower in all toilets. 
• CPVC pipeline Ashirvad /Supreme with standard tap fittings, and Drainage pipe line with rigid P V C fittings. 
• Hindware / Jaguar or Equivalent tap fittings. 
• Geyser provision will be provided in all toilets.

ELECTRICAL

• Adequate electrical points with Concealed copper wiring (Polycois I Anchor or equivalent made). 
• Three-phase power supply for each flat. 
• Transformer • Two ways switches will be provided in Master Bed room & Children Bed Room. 
• TV provision will be provided in Hall & Master Bedroom. 
• Computer power point and internet wiring will be given in children bedroom. 
• AC Provision will be given in all bedrooms. 
• Telephone wiring will be provided. 
• Anchor Roma /Polycab or equivalent made Modular electrical switches will be provided. 
• Inverter provision will be provided. 
• Washing machine provision will be provided. 

PAINTING 

• Internal : Asian Premium Emulsion paint with roller finishing over Birla/ Asian Putty. • External : Elevation Putty or Texture finishing with apex paints and all other sides with ACE Paints. 

OTHERS 

• The Owner /buyer is free to make necessary internal alterations in the specifications or plan to suit his requirements. Extra cost for all such alterations should be borne by the purchaser /Owner. 
• Registration charges, VAT, Service Tax, house assessment charges and other statutory taxes/charges of State & Central Govt should be borne by the Owner/purchaser

project_specification:
GeneralSTRUCTURE: 

G   2, R.C.C. framed structure with M-20 Grade concrete, Fe 500 Grade TMT steel.

WALLS: 

9" thick AAC block masonry for external walls.
4" thick AAC block masonry for internal walls.
AAC blocks from ultratech or equivalent make

DOORS: 

Teakwood door frame for main door and designer teak vinyl flush door with brass fittings. All internal doors with teakwood frames with designer moulded skin shutters with brass fittings.

WINDOWS: 

UPVC 3-track windows with safety grills and provision for mosquito mesh.

FLOORING: 

800 mm X 1200 mm vitrified tiles with 4" skirting of reputed brand for hall, dining, kitchen and bedrooms. 12"x12" ceramic tile flooring for balconies and utility.

PLASTERING: 

External walls with double-coat sponge finish. Internal walls with Gypsum plaster of Saint Gobain.

PAINTING: 

Two coats luppam finish with birla putty and Emulsion paint for internal walls. External wall with Birla putty and texture (as Suggested by the Architects) with Asian paints ACE or equivalent.

TOILETS: 

Anti-skid ceramic tile flooring with glazed tile dado up to 7' height with white colour Kohler or equivalent make EWC and washbasin.

ELECTRICALS: 

Concealed copper wiring of Finolex make with branded modular switches from Legrand, GM, Havells or equivalent.

Generator Back-Up: 

Common Areas and club house: common area lighting, and motors 
Villas: Fan and light in each room and TV point in living rooms.

WATER SUPPLY: 

Adequate usage water supply through bore wells and HMWSSB water connections.

PLUMBING: 

Ashirwad/Astral Flow Guard CPVC plumbing system with provision for solar geyser.

COMMUNICATION: 

Individual telephone and TV points in living rooms and all bedrooms.

INTERCOM: 

Amongst all villas and security cabin

project_specification: General	STRUCTURE :	R.C.C Earthquake resistant R.C.C framed structure		SUPER STRUCTURE :	Cellular block bricks in cement mortar inner walls-4 1/2”,		External walls : 6”		DOORS :	Main door with Teak-wood frame with polish, Internal doors Teak-Wood frame and moulded flush doors.		WINDOWS :	Complete Teak-Wood frames, Teak- wood shutters with glass panels and ornamental MS safety grills with standard fittings. Enamel paint to all the windows.		SANITARY :	Concealed pipeline with washbasin, Indian or European commode matching with tiles, standard CP fittings, provision for geyser in toilets (parryware/Jaguar).		FLOORING :	Flooring with branded Vitrified Tiles (2’x2’).		KITCHEN :	Black granite kitchen platform with steel sink .		FINISHING :	Wall(Internal) :	Cement plastered, smooth putty finish with plastic emulsion paint.		Walls/columns in parking area :	Cement plastered with column design		External Walls :	Cement plastered, plastic emulsion paint(Apex).		Toilet Walls :	Dado in ceramic tiles up to lintel level of Johnson or Kajaria make or equivalent.		Kitchen walls :	Dado in ceramic tiles of 2’0” height.		ELECTRICAL & OTHER CABLING :	Concealed wiring with multi-strand copper wiring with 3-phase meters and MCBs. Good quality modular switches Power plugs for A/C, Geyser, Mixer and Refrigerator. Concealed wiring for Telephone, TV and cable line in all rooms.		ELEVATOR :	One Elevator (Johnson/kone/equivalent) 6 passenger capacity with stand by generator.		STAIRCASE & CORRIDORS :	Granite (shell-white) & s.s railing, parking flooring V.D.F flooring.

project_specification: GeneralStructure     R.C.C framed structure with table moulded bricks in cement mortar.Main Doors     Teak wood frame and shutter Aesthetically designed with Veneer Polishing and Designer Hardware of reputed make.Internal Door     Teak wood frame and both sides molded flush doorsWindows     Teak wood frame and teak paneled shutters with security Grills.Flooring     Bed rooms, Drawing, Living, Dining & Kitchen: Vitrified Tiles of Size (2x2) for the entire Flat.Painting Internal     Altek Lappum finishes with Acrylic Emulsion paint.Painting External     Combination of textured/Smooth finish for all External walls.Kitchen     Granite Platform with Stainless Steel Sink with both Municipal & Bore water connection.Glazed Ceramic tiles dadooing up to 2' Ht. above kitchen Platform.Utilities/Wash     Wet area for washing utensils and glazed tiles up to 3' htToilets     Hot and Cold Wall Mixer with Shower.Provision for Geysers in all bath roomsC.P. Fittings are Chrome Plated ESS ESS make/equivalent make.Designer concept tiles of reputed make up to Door height.       Electrical     Concealed copper wiring in conduits for lights, fan, plug and power plug wherever necessary.Power outlets for air conditioners in all bedrooms.Power outlets for geysers in all toilets.Power plug for micro wave oven, mixer/grinder in kitchen.Plug point for refrigerator, TV wherever necessary.3 phase supply for each unit and individual meter boards.Miniature circuit breakers (MCB) for each distribution boards.All electrical fittings of Anchor / Toyoma or equivalent make.       Intercom     Intercom facility to all the units connecting to security with CCTV set up.Cable TV     Provision for Cable TV connection in Hall & Master Bed room.Power Back up     Acoustically insulated stand-by generator for lights in common areas and pumps.Power back up for Two points in each flat.       Parking     Aesthetically treated Two level parking.Lift     Six passenger lift with granite / tiles dadoing around ground floor entrance.Water Supply     Adequate water supply from over head tanks with provision for municipal water and bore well.Extras     Charges for shelves, any additional modifications or alterations shall be borne by the flat owners.

project_specification: General	Foundation & Structure:	Earthquake resistant RCC framed structure with TNR Ready-Mix Concrete     		Superstructure:	1) AAC blocks	2) Inner walls 4 ½", external walls 9"		Doors:	1) Main doors with Teak wood frame	2) Teak wood shutters	3) Internal doors with Teak wood frames and one side decorative Teak veneer doors     		Windows:	TNR’s UPVC windows with safety grills		Flooring:	1) Vitrified tiles with skirting	2) Anti-skid ceramic tile flooring in toilets, balconies and utility areas     	Sanitary:	Designer ceramic tiles up to 7’ height, concealed pipeline, European WCs wash basins of Hindware/Parryware or equivalent make Toilet accessories of standard make		Painting:	1) All interior walls with smooth finish and Acrylic emulsion paint over Birla/JK cement putty	2) All exterior walls with cement based exterior paint of Apex or equivalent     	Doors:	Wooden polish for all doors		Electrical:	1) Power plugs in all necessary areas	2) Electrical fittings and fixtures of Havells/ Legrand or equivalent make	3) Provision for electrical chimney in kitchen and exhaust fans in kitchen and bathrooms	4) Provision for split A/C units for all bedrooms, living and hall with 720 wire	5) 100% power back up except A/Cs and geysers     		Elevator:	Two automatic elevators with 6-passenger capacity of Kone/Johnson or equivalent make		Water Supply:	1) All pipelines will run from overhead tank to toilets and kitchen	2) Provision for Municipal water in kitchens     		Kitchen:	1) Granite counter with ceramic tile dado up to 2’ above the counter and stainless steel sink, ceramic tile cladding in the wash area	2) Reticulated gas pipeline provision for every flat		Security System:	Intercom system along with video phones shall be provided for additional security	Common Area:	Corridor and staircase granite flooring.

project_specification: GeneralStructure     R.C.C framed structure with table moulded bricks in cement mortar.Main Doors     Teak wood frame and shutter Aesthetically designed with Veneer Polishing and Designer Hardware of reputed make.Internal Door     Teak wood frame and both sides molded flush doorsWindows     Teak wood frame and teak paneled shutters with security Grills.Flooring     Bed rooms, Drawing, Living, Dining & Kitchen: Vitrified Tiles of Size (2x2) for the entire Flat.Painting Internal     Altek Lappum finishes with Acrylic Emulsion paint.Painting External     Combination of textured/Smooth finish for all External walls.Kitchen     Granite Platform with Stainless Steel Sink with both Municipal & Bore water connection.Glazed Ceramic tiles dadooing upto 2' Ht. above kitchen Platform.Utilities/Wash     Wet area for washing utensils and glazed tiles up to 3' ht.Toilets     Hot and Cold Wall Mixer with Shower.Provision for Geysers in all bath roomsC.P. Fittings are Chrome Plated ESS ESS make/equivalent make.Designer concept tiles of reputed make up to Door height.       Electrical     Concealed copper wiring in conduits for lights, fan, plug and power plug wherever necessary.Power outlets for air conditioners in all bedrooms.Power outlets for geysers in all toilets.Power plug for micro wave oven, mixer/grinder in kitchen.Plug point for refrigerator, TV wherever necessary.3 phase supply for each unit and individual meter boards.Miniature circuit breakers (MCB) for each distribution boards.All electrical fittings of Anchor / Toyoma or equivalent make.       Intercom     Intercom facility to all the units connecting to security with CCTV set up.Cable TV     Provision for Cable TV connection in Hall & Master Bed room.Power Back up     Acoustically insulated stand-by generator for lights in common areas and pumps.Power back up for Two points in each flat.       Parking     Aesthetically treated Two level parking.Lift     Six passenger lift with granite / tiles dadoing around ground floor entrance.Water Supply     Adequate water supply from over head tanks with provision for municipal water and bore well.Extras     Charges for shelves, any additional modifications or alterations shall be borne by the flat owners.

project_specification:
GeneralStructure:    

R.C.C. framed sturcture.

Super Structure:    

Prime AAC blocks/Red bricks in cement mortar

Finishing    

Plastering of ceiling and walls in C.M with smooth luppam finshing.

Main Doors:    

Best teak wood frame with teak wood shutters (Polish quality) / Designer shutters.

Doors:    

Medium teak wood frame with flush shutters.

Windows:    

"PRIME" uPVC window systems with opaque / transparent glass and safety grills.

Flooring :    

Vitrified tiles in hall, dining, bed rooms and kitchen. Ceramic tile flooring in toilets and balconies.

Kitchen :    

Black granite cooking platform with stainless steel sink and 2' height ceramic / glazed tiles dado.

Toilets:    

Glazed tiles dado up to 6' height. All fixtures in white colour of standard make. All CP fittings of Jaquar or equivalent make. Each toilet will have one wash basin EWC/WC, shower point and provision for exhaust fan and geyser point.

Electrification:    

Concealed copper wiring in PVC conduits with modular switches. Adequate fan points, TV. & telephone points, and 15A/5A power plugs.

Water supply :    

Borewell water and provision for Municipal water.

Painting:    

Internal walls and ceiling with plas
